the cbi has booked dera sacha sauda chief gurmeet ram rahim singh in connection with alleged forced castration of followers inside his ashram in sirsa haryana cheating voluntarily causing grievous hurt by dangerous weapons and criminal intimidation under the indian penal code following an order by the punjab and haryana high court a former dera follower had filed a petition in the high court in 2012 alleging that he along with around 400 male devotees of the dera were castrated inside the ashram on the orders of gurmeet ram rahim singh the high court had ordered a probe by the central bureau of investigation into the case in december the court asked the cbi to file the first status report by 2 march who is making his film debut with msg the messenger of god is also facing trial in connection with cases of murder of a journalist and sexual exploitation of his women disciples

the islamist militant group boko haram has agreed to a ceasefire and the release of more than 200 kidnapped school girls according to nigerian officials the girls were abducted six months ago from a school in chibok including a ceasefire and the release of 219 school girls whose abduction last april sparked international outrage said hassan tukur who represented the nigerian government at talks with the militant organization in neighboring chad they have agreed to release the chibok girls he continued despite international efforts mobilized by the twitter hashtag campaign bringbackourgirls to rescue them from captivity france great britain and the united states have helped with the search for the girls while china israel and other nations have also provided various forms of assistance but dozens managed to subsequently escape nigerian president goodluck jonathan has been criticized by the girls families for responding slowly to their abduction whose name roughly translates to western education is sacrilege seeks to impose a strict interpretation of shariah law in northern nigeria during its early years the sunni militant group engaged in isolated skirmishes with nigerian security forces but after a bloody government crackdown in 2009 boko haram launched a broad insurgency last summer boko haram leader abubakar shekau declared a calipate in the areas under his forces control muslim mosques schools markets bars villages police stations and even a un building an estimated 5000 nigerians have been killed and a further 300000 displaced by the violence the nigerian government declared a state of emergency in the northeastern states of borno yobe and adamawa amnesty international has accused the nigerian military of war crimes including extrajudicial killings in its fight against boko haram the united nations and human rights watch have also alleged that nigeria security forces have committed human rights abuses afp reuters

apple apparently wanted its smartwatches to focus heavily on features but the company was forced to changed direction according to the wall street journal the company originally envisioned a device that can monitor heart rate blood pressure and stress levels based on the conductivity of the skin unfortunately the sensors they tested just did pass muster which is entirely surprising since we reviewed plenty of wearables with patchy heart rate monitors in the past the company engineers found that hairy arms dry skin and even how tightly the watch is worn can affect the results and they did find a solution in time the wsj sources said as it continued sucking in resources for four years despite all the failures during testing its development slowed down once the company realized that a watch that meets its standards will be very hard to build at this time the lineup of watches due out in april are a lot different from the original one apple envisioned and are more of an iphone companion with a much simpler pulse monitor and pedometer the company expecting to sell a ton reportedly ordering around 6 million units from its asian suppliers just for the first quarter half of those are the apple watch sports while the stainless steel model makes up a third of that number as for cupertino original vision well there always a chance that we see it come to life in the coming years the company has a good track record of substantially improving its devices after a debut model appears the first iphone did have 3g

if you already using ios 8 icloud drive feature you might want to avoid your iphone reset menu macrumors reports that a newly discovered bug causes icloud drive documents to be permanently erased from the cloud whenever a a user picks reset all settings ordinarily this option would simply do what it says the iphone settings and preferences are immediately reset to their original factory defaults no media music photos etc or documents are supposed to be erased or otherwise affected when performing this action that should only happen if you choose erase all content and settings and wipe your phone entirely with macrumors reporting that documents stored in icloud drive are disappearing from apple iwork apps upon reset they also vanishing from os x yosemite which will bring icloud drive to mac users later this fall right now it ios users along with yosemite developers and beta testers reporting the problem icloud drive is also available on windows but it unclear if the issue has popped up there it also not yet obvious how widespread the bug is or whether it affects everyone that has transitioned to icloud drive using reset all settings deleted all iwork documents stored in icloud drive on the iphone and on after allowing time for syncing to a mac running os x yosemite all of the documents disappeared from that machine as well preview and textedit documents which can not be accessed on the iphone remained untouched on the mac but has yet implemented a similar option for all of icloud macrumors notes the issue may be limited to apple own iwork apps like pages keynote and numbers and icloud drive files from other apps could be safe from the bug but for now the best option is avoiding reset all settings entirely until a fix is in place we reached out to apple for clarification on just what going on

investment firm piper jaffray issued a report on monday breaking down expected apple watch average selling prices saying an aggregate of consumers will likely spend closer to 550 on the device considering case and internal storage options analyst gene munster anticipates combined apple watch asps to fall closer to 550 or 575 to 600 including additional bands apple watch and apple watch edition each series including two display sizes and a variety of strap choices the aluminum and glass version widely thought to be the least expensive model munster expects an asp of 450 after factoring in configuration alternatives like case and internal storage options which also features a more expensive sapphire glass cover is expected to start at 499 to 549 again depending on customizable features munster sees an overall asp at around 650 for the watch series the analyst forecasts base model apple watch edition devices to start at 4999 but classifies segment asp closer to 7500 after adding in straps made from precious metals which come in at 35 munster sees elastomer apple watch straps to start in a similar 29 to 35 range while leather bands could be priced between 49 to 59 pricing for metal bands like the link bracelet and milanese loop are more difficult to determine but the analyst believes steel versions will come in at 99 while gold bands could be priced into the thousands of dollars 35 percent leather 10 percent steel and about 5000 total gold bands are sold the average band asp could be around 50 munster writes equating to a 575 asp if every watch customer purchases an extra strap it would tack on 50 bringing asp up to 600 while the apple watch will take another 45 percent that leaves very little room for apple watch edition but munster believes apple might sell roughly 10000 units this year in an interesting comparison the firm calculates that apple watch edition business could equate to about two percent of luxury watchmaker rolex which moves between 600000 to 750000 units each year munster expects apple to reveal a better sense of device pricing at its march 9 event as well as highlight special features to drum up consumer interest ahead of release

as a video of a generous homeless man continues to touch and move millions around the world a california man has come forward to claim that the internet prankster behind it faked a significant portion of the film confirming our earlier suspicions youtube star josh paler lin purports to give a homeless man named thomas 100 and then secretly follow him around to see how he spends it thomas walks right into a liquor store but instead of alcohol the homeless man defies expectations and walks out with a couple of bags of food then heads to a nearby park and starts giving it away to other people down on their luck apparently moved by the selfless act lin confronts thomas and tells him that being filmed the video had racked up more than 27 million views on youtube and inspired more than 150 glowing news articles from around the world following its success lin launched an indiegogo fundraising campaign to thomas get a fresh which has netted more than 127000 in donations from the public says taugan tan kadalim who claims that on 20 he was outside the euclid liquor market where the pivotal scene is set knew he was being who lives in an apartment complex directly across the street as he was walking out of the liquor store kadalim says he spotted lin sitting in the seat of a nearby vehicle and recognized him immediately from his previous prank videos was like my god says kadalim adding that he subscribed to youtube channel believe and behind him was the man who kadalim would later recognize as thomas the homeless samaritan lin claims was secretly followed with a hidden camera thinking the three men were about shoot a prank video kadalim decided to stick around and watch lin hopped out of the car went inside the liquor store and spoke with the cashier while the two men chatted inside thomas waited with his bag by car eventually the prankster returned to his car and a few minutes later thomas wandered into the liquor store several calls to euclid liquor market to confirm account went unanswered kadalim says thomas appears to be followed from a distance for several blocks and as he enters the store lin says to his cameraman filming make sure he see a fellow youtube prank enthusiast he shared the text with vocativ and the date and time stamps appear to match up girlfriend who spoke on the condition that we not use her name also corroborates the account she tells vocativ wait to watch the released on 22 he was floored he drove thomas to the liquor he says i think the guy is homeless it is clear that from what i saw every part of that scene was kadalim called his girlfriend and his brother to tell them what happened as the video started to go viral just before christmas he posted a comment to youtube channel explaining what he witnessed his words however were quickly buried beneath an outpouring of praise as thousands left comments in support of the video he says frustrated because dishonest and lin told vocativ that not a single scene had been staged or scripted is no way making any of this he said is lin told us previously that he plucked thomas from the homeless shelter where been staying and put him up in a hotel the name of which lin would not disclose lin has also refused all media requests to speak with thomas and he denied repeated requests from vocativ to make thomas available for an interview at the same time been busy producing more videos starring the homeless man including this surprise released sunday in which he plans to surprise thomas with all of the money been raised for him on indiegogo asked how the public could be certain those funds would actually go to thomas lin told us that his lawyers agent and manager have everything when asked for the names of his lawyers agent and manager lin refused to provide them claiming they are he also declined to let any of them speak with vocativ

an explosion and a crater reported near the capital of nicaragua raised suspicions on monday that a meteorite had split off from an asteroid that passed by earth this weekend and struck our planet but nasa scientists have now cast doubt on whether the blast outside managua was even a meteorite at all dubbed 2014 rc which passed harmlessly by earth over the weekend about the size of a house 2014 rc passed within 22000 miles 36000 kilometers of our planet on sunday but the miss distance of 2014 rc actually precludes any related meteorite impact at the managua crater says mit asteroid expert richard binzel by email geophysicist wilfried strauch of nicaragua institute of earth studies attributed the crater to a meteorite impact nasa asteroid expert don yeomans author of objects finding them before they find us says that outside experts suspect the crater was caused by an impact so the explosion and the asteroid are unrelated says yeomans because the earth moves about 870000 miles million kilometers in 13 hours there was no obvious optical fireball or debris trail seen prior to the explosion so it seems unlikely that the explosion in nicaragua was related to a meteorite impact most notably in the february 15 2013 chelyabinsk impact which damaged buildings across central russia see chelyabinsk meteor the animated movie with about 500 kilotons of energy bright enough to sunburn some watchers a larger asteroid had passed harmlessly over the southern hemisphere on the same date astronomers at nasa object program based at the jet propulsion laboratory in pasadena california revised size estimates for the asteroid radar observations indicate that the asteroid is about 40 feet 12 meters across and rotates rapidly several times a minute that makes it roughly half the size of the 2013 russian meteorite citing the difference in the asteroid flyby and the crater explosion as yet no eyewitness accounts or imagery have come to light of the fireball flash or debris trail that is typically associated with a meteor of the size required to produce such a crater noted the statement

the apple watch might have been four years in the making and the most jony apple product yet but the company get everything it was wishing for from the device apple originally wanted its smartwatch to focus far more prominently on innovations only to be forced to go in another direction midway through the project the apple watch would have boasted smart sensors capable of tracking blood pressure heart rate and even stress levels but despite hiring top people from the biosensor industry the technology work quite as well as had been hoped with sensor results also varying depending on how loosely or tightly the watch is worn despite a heavy drain on apple resources engineers were unable to create a suitable solution in time for the company to reveal the device the apple watch shipping in april will be far more of an iphone than had originally been planned which is no doubt useful for growing interlocking ecosystem but is less good in other ways although apple has the luxury of taking its time with products new yorker story reveals how much pressure there was to announce a new category of device jobs the applications of the apple watch were ones that people are very excited about apple has already had success introducing healthkit into top hospitals and a medically approved wearable could potentially help grow relations between apple and the healthcare industry steve wozniak discussed as one of the most potentially exciting features of the apple watch cult of mac has also written about the potential of the apple watch becoming your it seems going to have to wait at least a couple of generations before the technology can live up to that billing

ahead of monday media event where apple is expected to provide final details on the apple watch a new report from techcrunch details a hidden diagnostic port inside one of the channels on the apple watch where watch bands slip into place while the port is currently used only for diagnostic purposes the report argues it could be used in the future to interface with smart band accessories bringing additional functionality to the port has a brass contact array inside the groove for the strap connector slot several sources have confirmed its existence and placement to me it is very similar to the connector for the lightning connector in iphones as that connector currently only uses 6 of its 8 available pins apple recently began opening up the lightning port for use by third parties a source says that this port is currently for diagnostic purposes only but that there is nothing preventing it from being a connection port for future matthew panzarino is careful to state that he has no knowledge of any plans by apple to launch such smart band accessories but the idea remains an intriguing one possibilities for such bands include additional sensors external batteries integrated into a band and more but even now with a launch set for next month there is still much that remains unknown including pricing details beyond the 349 starting price apple will undoubtedly address many of the details at monday events but some of the technical details will likely need to wait until the device launches and users and technical experts can get a closer look at the device according to 9to5mac tag

a satirical website has poked fun at the chinese practice of choosing alternative english names in a report urging citizens to think carefully before making their decision which is done in the style of the cctv website warns people against picking a name that could cause offence or simply make no sense at all many chinese people prefer to use an english name particularly if they conduct business with the west but the satirical site suggests people should avoid fictional characters names with the potential for sexual innuendo or random words like dragon fish or lawyer which could come back and haunt you if you want a call back from that serious law firm in america and where you come from so names such as satan or dumbledore are out the website says women are told to think carefully about food names such as candy lolly or sugar which might be seen as stripper names there also a lengthy warning about names with sexual connotations especially when used in conjunction with dong or wang which are used as slang for male genitalia so avoid anything like wang at all times the website says instead a traditional name like elizabeth catherine william or george is considered a good choice pick one of these if you looking for a english name often with implications of wealth the website advises

information and cnn can not independently confirm it but kim yo jong star appears to be rising who runs the blog north korea leadership watch says kim yo jong has been identified in north korean media as deputy director of the workers party a very powerful position an analyst with the center for strategic and international studies who previously handled the north korea account with the national security council says kim yo jong began surfacing publicly earlier this year at party functions cha says i can see how it possible that she in some sort of temporary position it very difficult for the north korean system to run without one of the kim family at least titularly in charge so if kim jong un is indisposed she really the only available body that left in terms of a direct kim family line and attended private school in switzerland with kim jong un they both stayed at the north korean embassy while attending the swiss school madden says and lived there under assumed names kim jong il had with four women many of them are but kim jong un and kim yo jong have the same mother and after returning from switzerland she was appointed to positions of responsibility in the government she would act as an leader inspecting sites before official visits and had administrative duties as well he says she continues those duties and has taken on more responsibility under her brother rule dealing with policy and receiving intelligence briefings she acts almost like a white house would madden says north are concerned about her being in the top leadership spot if only temporarily the stress and palace intrigue inside the north korean regime they say may be overwhelming to me that is quite alarming cha says it means there is something seriously wrong with kim jong un and there is some sort of void that they desperately trying to fill october that the 69th anniversary of the founding of the ruling workers party kim jong un attended the anniversary event last year if he does show up at friday ceremonies concern over his public disappearance will only grow intelligence analysts will be looking at his appearance his body language every detail very carefully sacred birth macbook air which is expected to come with a screen will have a new that will abandon traditional specifications to produce a noticeably thinner and lighter device compared to the current model according to a report while also sporting a taller body in order to incorporate the slightly larger display 9to5mac reported citing within with access to prototype of the device the bezels on the display could also be narrowed out on all sides to get a larger display fitted into the footprint which is about the same size as the current version the new macbook air could also feature an keyboard with a redesigned key set allowing each key to sit closer together the report said adding that the move is said to be aimed at making the computer as compact as possible but with a taller frame almost touching the bottom of the keyboard 9to5mac reported adding that the new trackpad may come without the clicking effect found on existing macbook models there could be four new speaker grilles that are expected to also function as ventilation ports as the device lacks traditional computer fans the macbook air could do away with standard usb ports the sd card slot and thunderbolt and magsafe charging standards in favor of a single usb port which is reportedly smaller faster and better than the existing usb and ports in addition the usb port is reversible similar to that of the lightning connector on the latest ios devices while the new usb port will sit on the left side of the device the right side will accommodate the headphone jack along with input and microphones according to the report suppliers were stocking up inventory of related components for the new macbook air in anticipation of the device entering production

update the original source of the story bloomberg now adds that the face of michelle obama was not blurred by the state tv it quotes several journalists from within saudi arabia covering the event adding that the state tv in fact did not blur the face of the first lady anyway information director at the saudi embassy in washington the blurring real good night twitter 2015 who passed away last week the saudis however seem to be enamored by the presence of the first lady in their country the saudi state television allegedly blurred out the face of michelle obama during a brief televised meeting between the new saudi king salman and the president at riyadh the capital of saudi arabia in fact the new king reportedly refused to acknowledge the presence of the first lady and did not say hello or shake hands with her the report adds other media houses from the middle east however showed the unedited footage of the meeting without obscuring the face of michelle obama several of them were posted to facebook reports the washington times however most of the videos were subsequently taken down probably at the behest of internet police a version of the clip is now up on youtube we are unsure however how long it would remain there we have managed to capture a screenshot of the video just in case the video is embedded below michelle obama also faced criticism from some arab media outlets for her decision to wear blue on her visit they added that the first lady should have worn a black dress which is more appropriate for a funeral also pertinent to note was the fact that michelle obama did not wear a head scarf during the time she was out in public as per saudi law all women in the country even visitors are required by law to wear a head scarf while in public this is perhaps why the state tv blurred the first lady out entirely however could have been due to the inexperience of the new king others allege the saudi king held bilateral talks with other senior staff including secretary of state john kerry senator john mccain national security adviser susan rice ambassador joseph westphal and cia director john brennan a statement by the white house later announced the following it was only recently that the country gave womenfolk the right to vote it is also the only country in the world where women are not allowed to drive now with even the wife of the most powerful man being targeted albeit indirectly the world is certain to take note

managua nicaragua ap nicaragua government said sunday that a mysterious boom heard overnight in the capital was made by a small meteorite that left a crater in a wooded area near managua airport said humberto saballos a volcanologist with the nicaraguan institute of territorial studies who was on the committee he said it is still not clear if the meteorite disintegrated or was buried of the astronomy center at the national autonomous university of nicaragua said the meteorite could be related to an asteroid that was forecast to pass by the planet saturday night he said an adviser to the institute of territorial studies said it was very strange that no one reported a streak of light we have to ask if anyone has a photo or something but said they did see anything strange in the sky then all of a sudden i heard a large blast we thought it was a bomb because we felt an expansive wave jorge santamaria told the associated press

the man who broke into the white house two weeks ago was able to make his way far into the property before being tackled in the east room the room where president obama and many other presidents have made some of their most important announcements a law enforcement official confirmed today to abc news which had suggested that omar gonzalez 42 of texas had been taken into custody near the front doors of the white house after jumping the fence and running more the 100 yards into the national landmark prosecutors say and was physically apprehended after entering the white house north portico the secret service said in a statement on 20 gonzalez was allegedly carrying a folding pocket knife after pushing through the front doors he ran to the east room according to the official confirming details first reported by the washington post but the director julie pierson will be on the hot seat tuesday as the house oversight and government reform committee hold a hearing to examine several issues dogging the secret service the chairman of the committee darrell issa said gonzalez got deep enough into the white house that had president obama or vice president joe biden been there could have been including additional barriers outside of the white house gates in addition the secret service foot patrols along the fence line of the white house complex and deployed additional surveillance resources a white house spokesman said at the time including a tour in iraq

amazon is going to open a store in new york city in time for holiday shopping the wall street journal reports across from the empire state building and will give amazon a way to connect with customers in the physical world with inventory for delivery in new york city and would also act as a hub for product returns exchanges and pickup of online orders sources also said that amazon might use the space to showcase products like its new kindle tablets its fire smartphone and its tv box fire tv and the company may decide to ditch the idea however if amazon does open the store and has a successful launch it may open more locations in other us cities it put kindle vending machines in malls across the country but this would be its biggest riskiest attempt as the journal points out opening up physical locations would be cheap leases new employees and managing inventory would all cut into the company already thin profit margins an area that sees a lot of because of its proximity to the empire state building and ample shopping

the tv streaming services market may be on the verge of the biggest change yet given reports hbo and apple may be talking about an exclusive partnership that would leave netflix amazon and every other market player scrambling to make similar moves to grow subscription base and push tv boxes and sticks into consumer hands built and designed by major league baseball advanced media which is scheduled to debut by april 12 telecomm or satellite provider paying either a set standalone monthly fee or as part of a content bundle package however consumers will be able to subscribe directly from hbo for a 15 monthly fee reports say time warner which owns hbo is aiming to build a network of distributors to push the hbo now service to the 10 million broadband households that are not subscribed to a cable tv bundle service and the 70 million cable tv subscribers who are hbo subscribers landing hbo now for its fledgling apple tv would be a major coup and compliment hbo go a mobile streaming service already available via apple tv since 2013 however may prove a sticky point as entrenched competitor netflix has kept its prices at nearly half that cost there also the potential of exhausting consumers with fees given they already laying out money for the web tv boxes and sticks while these costs are typically much less than a cable subscription the increasing number of standalone services could prove to be confusing and ultimately more expensive at some point however that hbo believes the hbo now cost is appropriate and is about the change the reported pricing of 15 a month and it will be priced accordingly hbo ceo richard plepler said during an earnings call last month and apple has declined to comment an hbo spokesman said in a statement and when we have details to share we will do so one of the most popular streaming content programs to date the arrival of hbo now is expected to debut with the fifth season premiere transparent has won an emmy award

josh paler lin a youtube star whose channel has more than subscribers decided that he wanted to try a social experiment testing the belief that all homeless people would spend money on alcohol lin gave a homeless man 100 and followed him around with a camera to see what he would do with the money who is named thomas he headed straight for the liquor store affirming many when he emerges from the store with a large bag however thomas goes straight to the park and pulled out food and shared it with the other homeless there was no alcohol in the bag homeless man hug lin confronts thomas only to find out that he did know any of the people in the just wanted to help other people in need lin felt so bad about his assumption that he approached thomas again to give him more money he then found out that thomas had quit his job to take care of his sick parents but lost his family home after they died he has been living on the street for four months lin also setup an indiegogo page to help get thomas back on his feet so far donations have reached close to 56000 lin said on the today show for me it completely the opposite i feel that he changed my life

if north korea supreme leader kim is not running the hermit kingdom then who is of course that the leader has run into serious health problems physical or political and no one yet knows that for sure only that he has remained out of public view for five weeks that enough to start a serious guessing game that has quelled speculation on who might grasp the reins of power if they slip or have slipped from his chubby hands but perhaps the most intriguing is kim yo jong who wields the ultimate trump card as youngest daughter of the late departed leader kim jong il and granddaughter of the founder of the country kim il sung the north korea intellectuals solidarity says she may be directing the government at least temporarily particularly members of the kim family little is known of kim yo jong and much of that is a compilation of snippets of information who runs the blog north korea leadership watch he says kim yo jong was been identified in the north korean media as deputy director of the workers party of korea a powerful position indeed kim something of a chief of staff running his public events itineraries and logistical needs in addition she has ties to the guard command and ministry of state security switzerland from 1996 to 2000 using the name kim sun and living in the north korean embassy her brother now supreme leader was also studying nearby madden says that some photos of her as child were captured on home video by other parents at the school notably in december 2011 at various events held for her deceased father kim jong il she has also been shown in the north korean media in the background while her brother visits hospitals or children camps and can be seen sitting in the elite arm chair section reserved for high officials though on the second row at a concert attended by her brother raising speculation as to which of these powerful figures had the upper hand in pulling it off madden tells global post at the present time i would not be surprised if she is sole gatekeeper an analyst with the center for strategic and international studies who handled the north korea portfolio with the national security council tells cnn that if kim yo jong at age 27 is in fact running the country it means there is something seriously wrong with kim jong un and there is some sort of void that they desperately trying to fill who has moved up quickly under kim jong un as vice marshall of the korean people army and new chief of the general political bureau of the kpa he is of the organization and guidance department for the workers party of korea a post that finalizes appointments within north korea leadership including the arrest and execution of the supreme leader uncle jang song theak a general hwang who is believed to be around 65 years old led a north korean delegation on a surprise visit to south korea ostensibly to visit the asian games where north korean athletes were participating the delegation reportedly gave the south koreans only one day notice decked out in his cap also held talks with top south korean officials and agreed to restart peace talks between the two countries which are still technically at war tightly controlled north korea and makes him a prime contender for the top spot in a secretive world like north korea powerful figures may well operate out of the shadows one clue to the pecking order though is a favorite of old cold war kremlinologists seeing who sits next to whom at public events literally and figuratively has been o kum chol who was shown in july sitting two seats away from kim at a volleyball game o kum chol portfolio includes military strategy and planning as well as relations with foreign militaries he is also a member of the central committee of the workers party of korea and deputy of the supreme people assembly which gives him considerable clout the guy sitting between him and kim jong un was none other than hwang pyong so the speculation will continue

gill rosenberg the canadian israeli volunteer fighting with kurdish forces posted on facebook on monday night that she was safe and secure and not captured by isis guerillas as had been widely reported in the media has apparently not been captured by the islamic state as widely reported in the media i totally safe and secure i do have internet access or any communication devices with me for my safety and security the post continued i ca reply regularly and only happened to have a chance to log in and see these bullshit news stories ignore the reports i been captured yalla acharai after me among them rosenberg according to the report prior to their capture islamic state fighters made three suicide bombing attacks against kurdish outposts killing some and capturing many others saying that rosenberg was in the area when it was attacked rosenberg wrote that she would be without internet access for at least two weeks she wrote at the time please do not message as this is not me thank you 31 a resident of tel aviv joined the kurdish troops against islamic state in northern syria earlier this month according to reports rosenberg said she had contacted kurdish fighters over the rosenberg immigrated to israel from canada in 2006 leaving behind a career as a civilian pilot and served for two years in the israel defense forces in 2009 she was extradited to the united states and jailed over an international phone scam one of her former lawyers said was training with kurdish guerrillas and would fight in neighboring syria a lot like us really she told israel radio explaining her decision to enter the combat zone in northern syria

nasa has raised doubts about whether a loud boom and a gaping crater found in nicaragua this weekend were caused by a meteorite as the government has said the lack so far of any eyewitness accounts of a fireball lighting up the nighttime sky outside the capital managua suggest something else was behind the event bill cooke estimated that it would have been created by a blast of roughly the energy equivalent of 1 tonne of tnt it would have generated a very bright fireball and nothing was reported despite the population so i very sceptical a government spokeswoman and wife of the president daniel ortega said on sunday that a relatively small meteorite was responsible for the phenomenon the following afternoon she said scientists from other countries had expressed interest in coming to investigate a scientist who advises the nicaraguan presidency on environmental matters said he could not confirm for sure it was a meteorite but said that among the possibilities it one of the most likely he said he suspects a meteorite composed of rock and suddenly i heard the explosion and felt the shockwave which was very strong said victor gutierrez a mechanic who lives less than a mile from the site of the crater i did see anything in the sky either before or after an executive for nasa object observations program agreed that whatever happened in nicaragua had nothing to do with an asteroid that flew past earth this weekend the object known as 2014 rc was about as far away as the moon johnson said 2014 rc passage close to the planet happened about 13 hours later ranging from ordinance to someone out blowing things up

the new season of game of thrones starts next month and you know what that means cue the mad dash to secure someone hbo go password in time but for cord cutters and cord who want to tune in online this year may mark the first time they been able to do so without breaking the rules according to international business times hbo now as it allegedly being called would cost and open up access to hbo film and tv titles to distributors like apple tv and roku hbo announced that it would finally unbundle its streaming services from cable in 2015 and the hbo now launch could be signals that hbo is making good on that promise but the companies are reportedly trying to wrap up negotiations in time for the season 5 premiere of game of thrones next month so it likely a safe bet that recent hbo content would be available through the apple service the new service had better deliver on quantity as both services offer robust streaming libraries of their own however while the quality of the content on those services can vary wildly the hbo brand is known for its acclaimed original series like the wire the sopranos and six feet under who increasingly occupy a demographic that moving away from cable have long craved a streaming hbo has deflected the matter for years the hbo now launch must navigate the complexities of hbo longstanding relationship with cable warner hbo parent company reportedly makes 70 of its profits from cable subscriptions but if the current negotiations with apple are successful the now service could be hbo first crack at making good on its promise to cord cutters

london the world knows him as john the masked man with a british accent who has beheaded several hostages held by the islamic state and who taunts audiences in videos circulated widely online according to friends and others familiar with his case is mohammed emwazi a briton from a family who grew up in west london and graduated from college with a degree in computer programming he is believed to have traveled to syria around 2012 and to have later joined the islamic state the group whose barbarity he has come to symbolize said one of close friends who identified him in an interview with the washington post was like a brother to me i am sure it is a moniker given to him by some of the hostages he once held asim qureshi research director at the rights group cage said after watching one of the videos is making me feel fairly certain that this is the same including voice analysis and interviews with former hostages to try to identify jihadi john james comey the director of the fbi said in september only a month after the briton was seen in a video killing american journalist james foley that officials believed they had succeeded the identity of jihadi john has remained shrouded in secrecy since killing he has appeared in a series of videos documenting the gruesome killings of other hostages including four other westerners some of whom he personally beheaded he is dressed in all black a balaclava covering all but his eyes and the ridge of his nose he wears a holster under his left arm citing legal advice in his appears to have left little trail on social media or elsewhere online those who knew him say he was polite and had a penchant for wearing stylish clothes while adhering to the tenets of his islamic faith he had a beard and was mindful of making eye contact with women friends said who spoke on the condition of anonymity because of the sensitivity of the investigation believe that emwazi started to radicalize after a planned safari in tanzania following his graduation from the university of westminster abu talib never made it on the trip once they landed in dar es salaam in may 2009 they were detained by police and held overnight unclear whether the reason for the detention was made clear to the three but they were eventually deported where he claimed that an officer from mi5 domestic security agency accused him of trying to reach somalia where the militant group operates in the southern part of the country according to that he sent to qureshi and that were provided to the post which is allied with a british newspaper which identified emwazi as muhammad ibn muazzam where he met with qureshi in the fall of 2009 to discuss what had happened was quite incensed by his treatment that he had been very unfairly qureshi said emwazi decided to move to his birthplace kuwait where he landed a job working for a computer company according to the he wrote to qureshi he came back to london twice the second time to finalize his wedding plans to a woman in kuwait however counterterrorism officials in britain detained him again this time fingerprinting him and searching his belongings when he tried to fly back to kuwait the next day he was prevented from doing so he wrote in a june 2010 to qureshi but now feel like a prisoner only not in a cage in london a person imprisoned controlled by security service men stopping me from living my new life in my birthplace country when a court in new york sentenced aafia siddiqui an operative convicted for the attempted murder of personnel in afghanistan emwazi expressed sympathy for her saying he had the upsetting news regarding our sister this should only keep us firmer towards fighting for freedom and justice qureshi said he last heard from emwazi in january 2012 when emwazi sent him an seeking advice qureshi said in the end he felt were taken to criminalize him and he had no way to do something against these the friend said he was gone one of the friends said at some stage reached the point where he was really just trying to find another way to get emwazi contacted his family and at least one of his friends unclear what he told them about his activities there syria in the hostages nicknamed the facility emwazi was joined by two other men with british accents including one who was dubbed a former hostage said emwazi participated in the waterboarding of four western hostages they said was quiet and intelligent was the most a former hostage said the hostages were moved to a prison in the syrian city of raqqa the islamic de facto capital where they were visited often by the trio they appeared to have taken on more powerful roles within the islamic state qureshi said he sent an to emwazi he wrote god willing it will be good to catch

on friday nigerian armed forces chief air chief marshal alex badeh announced a ceasefire between president goodluck administration and the extremist group boko haram bedeh claimed the truce which was widely welcomed would lay the groundwork for the release of the more than 200 girls who were abducted in april spurring the explosion of the hashtag bringbackourgirls the supposedly appeased group launched an attack on a town in adamawa state in eastern nigeria capturing 40 women and planting a flag in the town of wagga they also beheaded six victims during an assault on friday after the ceasefire deal was announced all of which makes a truce supposedly negotiated with the of of the boko haram group and the nigerian government seem decidedly shaky and boko subsequent actions have left people in nigeria scratching their heads with experts saying the ceasefire may have been a mirage either a fraud concocted by the government or the middleman who brokered the agreement whose links to boko haram are now in dispute with many questioning whether he is in fact the chief of security and has the authority to speak on its behalf during an interview on friday ahmadu explicitly say that boko haram had agreed to a ceasefire and he did not give details of the release arab news reports elders in borno state in have publicly said that they believe the government was negotiating with a fraudster and have yet to talk to the real boko haram meanwhile has not released a public statement about the ceasefire rather they have continued on a weekend campaign of violence holding running battles with nigerian security forces who say that they have yet to receive any word from their superiors ordering them to cease fire in skirmished with the insurgents and whether he has the mandate of the entire group or just a faction of the entire arab news quoted nnamdi obasi senior analyst of nigeria for crisis group an independent nongovernmental organization as rumored he will announce his run for in february 2015 over the next few weeks the government said it has been working on negotiations with boko haram for months

washington the pentagon on friday confirmed that the leader of an organization in africa was killed in a airstrike in somalia this week ahmed abdi godane was targeted monday in an airstrike that hit a vehicle and compound in a militant stronghold south of the capital mogadishu including the bloody siege at the upscale westgate mall in nairobi kenya in september 2013 that killed 67 people pentagon press secretary rear admiral john kirby said in a statement the pentagon said it could not confirm godane death allies and partners to counter the regional and global threats posed by violent extremist organizations kirby said in the statement released friday which has pushed the terrorist groups out of mogadishu despite the government successes the terror group has been able to operate in parts of the country that remain out of the reach of the government influence the united states will continue to use the tools at our disposal financial diplomatic intelligence and military to address the threat that and other terrorist groups pose to the united states and the american people the white house said in a statement

suspected militant islamists have shot and slaughtered people in three villages in nigeria despite government claims that it had agreed a truce with them residents say and raised their flag in a third residents said despite the alleged breach of the truce and that the militants would release the schoolgirls abducted from the remote town of chibok taking place in neighbouring chad by danladi ahmadu mr ahmadu was bogus and an imposter said ahmad salkida a nigerian journalist with good contacts in boko haram after capturing them in separate raids in may and july nigeria privately owned this day newspaper reports we expect boko haram to deliver on the release of the chibok girls and the cessation of hostilities in nigeria he said nigeria government says saturday attacks have caused many nigerians to doubt whether the government has really negotiated a truce with boko haram especially as no statement has been issued by its leader abubakar shekau says bbc nigeria analyst bilkisu babangida a resident told bbc hausa they also slit the throats of villagers whom they came across he added the militants raided abadam village in neighbouring borno state and raised their flag over the village a resident who fled the area told the bbc the resident said he added it is difficult to have a ceasefire in an organisation that has many members and he is quoted by this day as saying president goodluck jonathan imposed a state of emergency in the northern states of borno yobe and adamawa vowing to crush the islamist insurgency or forbidden for muslims to take part in any political or social activity associated with western society which it sees as a symbol of western culture

planetary alignment on jan 4 2015 will decrease gravity for 5 minutes causing partial weightlessness 2015 at exactly pst am on january 4th pluto will pass directly behind jupiter in relation to earth this rare alignment will mean that the combined gravitational force of the two planets would exert a stronger tidal pull temporarily counteracting the own gravity and making people virtually weightless moore calls this the gravitational effect he promised they would experience a strange floating sensation when mercury venus earth mars jupiter saturn uranus neptune and pluto would be on the same side of the sun within an arc wide but now they are guaranteeing the occurrence as the gravitational effect of the other planets on the crust is maximum even at their closest approach wrong but if you jump in the air at am pst on january 4 2015 it should take you about 3 seconds to land back on your feet instead of the usual seconds mark this date on your calendar and share it with your friends zero gravity day is just around the corner

several iraqi news sources including al sabah and the website reported on wednesday that several isis fighters sought help at a hospital in mosul 250 miles north of the city of baghdad after developing symptoms of ebola virus infection reported that two cases of ebola and 26 cases of were confirmed by health authorities in mosul the newspaper also claimed that isis recruits from some african countries brought the virus to iraq quoting iraqi news sources ahmed rudaini has denied reports that two cases of ebola virus infection were diagnosed among isis militants in mosul the iraqi health ministry spokesperson said the infection could have been confirmed in mosul because none of the hospitals in the city have the diagnostic facilities he said only the central laboratory of public health in baghdad has the ability to confirm cases of ebola virus infection a who spokesperson christy feigh said we have no official notification that it is ebola it is unclear how the organization would be able to confirm the report or render assistance in suspected cases however reports that a kurdish official who appeared convinced that the reports were accurate told the kurdish news outlet xendan that the militants reported at the hospital in mosul with symptoms of ebola virus infection an outbreak of ebola among isis militants could have serious consequences due to lack of access to the areas it is also feared that isis militants could use the presence of the virus among its militants as a terror weapon against opponents further complicating the prosecution of the war against the extremist group the symptoms of ebola virus including vomiting diarrhea and bleeding in the late stages of the disease are similar to those of several other diseases including malaria yellow fever and typhoid fever thus it is possible that the militants who reported at the hospital in mosul were suffering from other diseases that have symptoms similar to ebola it is not possible to rule out that they were designed to cause confusion among isis fighters and discourage new recruits from joining the group it is not known that isis has a significant number of recruits from west african countries where the epidemic has been reported thousands of foreign recruits to isis arrived mostly from north african countries such as tunisia libya egypt algeria and somalia where there have been no reports of ebola outbreak liberia and guinea nigerian news sources reported that isis was making efforts to recruit fighters from the country the report led the nigerian government to issue a statement urging some middle eastern countries to carry out thorough background checks on nigerians applying for visas intelligence analyst and iraq specialist with the middle east research firm levantine group said that isis executed about 11 doctors in mosul for refusing to treat wounded militants in particular has been under isis control since june the city has reportedly suffered food water and power shortages since extremist militants took over residents have suffered brutal treatment with reports of executions and enslavement of minorities women and children the us and its allies carried out 17 airstrikes in syria and 12 in iraq the airstrikes in syria targeted isis facilities in al raqqah dayr az zawr and kobani while the strikes in iraq hit isis buildings and positions around mosul fallujah and sinja

not only has the upcoming steve jobs biopic likely found an actor to play jobs it may have found an actor to play apple steve wozniak too according to the wrap seth rogen is being considered for the role variety reports more definitely that he actually set to play it rogen would be acting alongside christian bale who is reported to have taken the part of jobs danny boyle who made trainspotting and 28 days later is directing based on a script by aaron sorkin jessica chastain is also reported to be under consideration for a part though it is known who she would be playing but with how little is known about this movie it hard to really gauge what it means for one it not clear how large the role of wozniak will be the film is supposed to take place in the moments preceding three major apple product launches and wozniak would necessarily be around for all of those having left apple in we also seen successful pairings of strong dramatic actors like bale with traditionally comedic actors like rogen in the past to quite a bit of success see last year the wolf of wall street for example so it possible that boyle is trying to emulate that here the hollywood reporter says that it is clear if an offer has been made to rogen yet but that the film producers do want him on board the reporter also says that bale deal is yet to close and remains at a delicate stage though sorkin has suggested that he on board this jobs film has had a rocky development process and has already had to restart once when david fincher was dropped from being its director still it sounding more and more like the studio behind this film is eager to get it made so perhaps we see some confirmation on all of this soon

it a common practice around the world to speed up tv shows in order to insert more commercial time the subtle speeding up can slice a couple of minutes from a 22 minute sitcom with little noticeable difference and broadcasters can plug in two more minutes of commercials per half hour it a last ditch effort perhaps to extract money out of a dying media delivery system before streaming obliterates the advertising model tbs does it with seinfeld reruns see below and worldwide it happens all the time from the bbc to india shows move a lot faster now and the sped up version feels a little more updated than the original slower version but who even watches actual tv anymore no tv adblock on 90 of internet very little advertising happy me

duncan hunter this week declared terrorists have been crossing the rio grande speaking to greta van susteren on fox news 7 2014 said learned from the border patrol that islamic state fighters had been nabbed trying to enter the country from mexico isis is coming across the southern border hunter said adding a moment later i know that at least 10 isis fighters have been caught coming across the mexican border in texas hunter also said but you know there going to be dozens more that did not get caught by the border patrol and hunter spokesman joe kasper declined to reveal the sources in its original 8 2014 online news report on declaration quoted the department of homeland security disputing his account marsha catron emailed the suggestion that individuals who have ties to isil have been apprehended at the southwest border is categorically false and not supported by any credible intelligence or the facts on the ground dhs continues to have no credible intelligence to suggest terrorist organizations are actively plotting to cross the southwest border the texas department of public safety wrote state legislators saying in an 8 2014 email it does not have any information to confirm statements about islamic terrorists or isis fighters entering the country a dps spokesman tom vinger confirmed the authenticity a dps deputy director robert bodisch mentioned the hunter interview and an 8 2014 news report by judicial watch a conservative news website stating islamic terrorists had entered the country from mexico according to unidentified homeland security sources judicial watch said four terrorists had been apprehended in the previous 36 hours by federal authorities and the dps in mcallen and pharr bodisch further wrote an unsecure border is certainly a vulnerability that can be exploited by criminals of all kinds and it would be naïve to rule out the possibility that any criminal organization would not look for opportunities to take advantage of security gaps along our international border that said dps does not have any information to confirm the specific statements recently reported in the press 2014 politifact in washington analyzed an august 2014 judicial watch story finding mostly false another claim that we know that isis is present in ciudad juarez which neighbors el paso research did not turn up any law enforcement official or news outlet that independently verified or corroborated the claim making the declaration that we know with certainty isis is in juarez a big stretch a terrorism expert said claim make much sense said daveed director of the center for the study of terrorist radicalization at the foundation for defense of democracies in washington and the department has unequivocally denied it not one shred of evidence this is the case informed we not confirmed hunter statement said hunter stands by what he said kasper wrote we make the point official channels deny then maybe in a few years from now the information will pop up on the front page of the washington post much like that newspaper this week reported new details about the secret service prostitution scandal kasper said too the lead texas agency entrusted with public safety alerted legislators of its own lack of confirmation similarly the idea there are dozens more that did not get caught by the border patrol is missing a factual basis this statement a hoax story alleging the british graffiti artist banksy has been arrested and has had his identity revealed has once again duped thousands of people online a website consisting entirely of fake stories the artist was arrested by metropolitan police at his studio and his identity revealed as paul horner originally from liverpool including details from police and quotes from those close to banksy it only takes the bare minimum of and research to spot that this story is a hoax a fake name for a writer who claims to have be a winning reporter but who unsurprisingly since his previous stories include declares november national muslim appreciation month and rodman leaves us to talk with leaders of isis has never been awarded any prizes for excellence in journalism major clue that the story is a hoax is that the exact same thing has happened before last february a fake press release that again claimed banksy has been arrested and again claimed his name is paul horner did the rounds with jezebel being one of the more websites to publish the hoax before later taking it down the latest arrested story has been shared more than 200000 times on facebook and twitter proving there are still people who will believe anything they read on the internet 000 banksy mural off wallking robbo graffiti artist and banksy rival diesbanksy condemns exhibition featuring his stolen artworkbansky pokes fun at gchq with cheltenham muralalternative miss world 2014 drag queens robots and a pvc octopus compete at shakespeare globe

outline mcdonald will stop serving overweight customers in an effort to battle increasing obesity rates mcdonald has decided to stop serving its products to overweight customers in a move designed to fight against growing obesity rates the fast food chain will implement the new policy on january 1st the report explains that scales will be installed in front of each register and customers will have to stand on the scales before ordering customers who higher than macdonald weight standards will not be served claims the report the story is of course a work of fiction mcdonald has certainly not announced any plans to implement such a policy it mixes these genuine reports with stories that are pure fiction and just a few stories are works of complete fiction those few articles are for entertainment purposes only the articles and stories may or may not use real names always a semi real mostly or substantially fictitious ways therefore just a few articles contained on this website daily buzz live are works of fiction any truth or actual facts contained in those stories or posts are purely incidental or coincidental and not intended to be or be construed as facts both true and fictional stories published on the site are presented as news stories and the site makes no effort to let readers know which stories are true and which are fiction a lot of readers are apt to believe the fictional reports that they see on the site and share them as true between then churn out an endless stream of drivelling nonsense gussied up as news it is wise to check out any stories that hit your social media feeds or inboxes before you share them usually searching a news portal such as google news will quickly reveal if a story is true

it hardly a secret that amazon wants to be your store for everything but despite it big pushes for delivery there still nothing like trudging into a physical store when you need something in a rush amazon seems to understand that all too well according to reports from cnbc and the wall street journal the titan is gearing up to open its first store in midtown manhattan in time for the holidays but this is the first time it thought about moving off of the internet and into meatspace two years ago rumor had it that amazon was going to open a physical shop in seattle devoted to books and its slew of kindle gadgets oh and who could forget those amazon lockers you could choose to route your goodies to amazon vision for its role in the real world has evolved a bit since then the journal notes that the new york outpost could act as a way to highlight its own products like fire tv but the bigger draw is the space role as a product pickup service hub think about it you be able to purchase something from amazon and schlep down to the store on 34th street to pick it up not exactly what you expected you be able to return it to that very same spot that sense of physical immediacy is something that amazon has always lacked now we just have to wait and see if it enough to warrant opening more of these things cnbc

to be using the application at the same time brown was shot blumenthal said a quick series of shots can be heard followed by a pause and then another quick succession of shots followed by four and the pause could be key in the investigation but it difficult to prove from the audio why the pause took place or whose narrative it supports and that he and a friend dorian johnson were walking down a street when wilson approached them in a police car but because brown and a friend were blocking traffic wilson tried to exit his vehicle but brown pushed him back into the car according to a at the car brown was struck in the back and then turned around and put his arms up as the officer kept shooting who identified herself only as josie said brown after going away from the vehicle following the first shot turned around taunted the officer and charged at him her account matches what wilson has told investigators a source with detailed knowledge of the investigation told cnn especially with an unarmed victim because at this point brown is defenseless he has no weapon said chestnut who represented the family of jonathan ferrell ferrell was an unarmed man who was shot and apple is reportedly limiting what apple watch apps are capable of doing ruling out certain features in order to ensure battery life is not too heavily drained in the initial model which could tarnish the launch developers working on applications for the new apple wearable have cautioned that consumers should temper their expectations of what the initial apple watch is capable of when the app store did not exist and only the apps by apple could be used while the smartphone ecosystem has dramatically changed since then and app store has proved a template for a new industry the apple watch looks as though it may mirror this model until capabilities improve and continued attempts to increase the time between recharges earlier reports suggested that the device would have only four hours of active battery life and many of the sensor features initially touted to be included have been cut due to inconsistency according to sumit mehra cto of y media labs an app studio which has been developing content for the apple watch and they want every app out there on the apple watch using these sensors because all of a sudden this watch will only give you four hours of battery life and then not a watch anymore if i have to charge my wrist every four said mehra in a statement to business insider with developers at the moment limited to creating extensions to iphone apps that will function on the watch this helps save battery for the wearable and means apps can run on the superior processor but also limits apple watch apps to notifications app extensions and presenting summaries of information essentially limited versions of what the iphone can already do and apple predicting huge numbers of sales for its first ever wearable consumers might be wise to rethink what the device is going to be capable of at least for the time being

the weather mike seidel has taken a lot of ribbing about what he was doing live on network tv this weekend but he do what online news sites and youtubers suggest he did north carolina saturday where an early season storm dropped 10 inches of snow nbc nightly news anchor lester holt introduced seidel while the back was turned to the camera seidel was hunched over fiddling with something to an awful lot of people who saw holt dump out of the live shot it appeared seidel was zipping up his pants having answered call meteorologist mike seidel appears to relieve himself during said shirley powell the weather spokesperson seidel she said was using his cell phone as an ifb that is short for interruptible feedback which is how reporters in the field get their cues from the control room the phone lost its signal just as the anchor was introducing the live shot powell told that seidel yanked off his gloves turned from the howling wind and was dialing the ifb when holt tossed to him since seidel have a phone signal he know he was on the air while he frantically dialed the phone seidel tucked his heavy gloves between his knees to keep them from blowing away when he finished dialing he yanked his gloves back on and turned to the camera but holt was already calling off the shot and moving on seidel was left hanging in the winter wind powell told me which is a backpack sized phone based transmitter andseidel would not have had a live truck engineer who might have alerted the control room of the communication problem we still know why the producer in the control booth took the shot live on the air with seidel turned away seidel is asked is your most embarrassing moment on the air he answers you want a list whatever was on that list before now just took a back seat and sadly for seidel the video will live forever online

cnn paul revere has stirred up this much anticipation in boston since his midnight ride from charlestown to lexington a recently unearthed time capsule he buried with fellow revolutionary samuel adams the man whom revere was riding to see that night to warn that the british were coming has got his former city state and most of the internet abuzz secretary of state william galvin who heads the state historical commission called pamela hatchfield the head of object conservation at boston museum of fine arts hatchfield told brooke baldwin on cnn newsroom on friday but because there was water infiltration in that area of the building it was decided that we try to see if we could find it investigate and see whether the box was still intact but the plaster that held the box in place is in good condition galvin said the capsule was placed by the duo in 1795 a year when adams was governor and when construction began on the state house and its iconic dome which would eventually be overlaid with copper by revere the box is believed to contain coins a plate and a plaque but no one knows for sure too said galvin we do know that yet whose office is inside the state house said the capsule contents are expected to be revealed sometime next week it getting some tlc and a thorough exam including over the weekend by the museum staff something that has hatchfield a little worried they cleaned the contents with acid she said so we a little concerned that things maybe deteriorated inside so we are optimistic that the box itself has withstood the test of time and that it will therefore be holding the contents securely he said and that he mulling both a new container for the capsule and new items from the current era carma hassan and brooke baldwin contributed to this story

experts have raised doubts about whether a loud boom and a gaping crater found in nicaragua crowded capital managua this weekend were caused by a meteorite as the government has said but it did leave a crater measuring 12 metres across and was felt throughout the capital the lack so far of any eyewitness accounts of a fireball lighting up the nighttime sky outside managua on saturday suggests something else was likely behind the event head of nasa meteoroid environment office estimated that the crater would have been created by a blast of roughly an energy equivalent of 1 ton of tnt it would have generated a very bright fireball and nothing was reported despite the population cooke said so i very sceptical which passed very close to earth and was estimated by astronomers to be about 20 meters big or the size of a house william martinez said it was not yet clear if the meteorite burned up completely or if it had been blasted into the soil martinez said first lady rosario murillo said nicaraguan authorities would be in contact with the us geological service to try to get more information about this fascinating event in the central american nation one of latin america poorest countries and that liquid sand and dust were blown through the air which smelled like something had burned and flights at the airport were not affected

claim a vacationing man discovered that increasing pain he was experiencing was due to a tropical spider living under his skin october 2014 social media lit up with a seemingly implausible tale an australian man named dylan thomas quickly became the subject of international buzz via facebook after he asserted that during his vacation trip to bali a spider burrowed under his skin and had to be surgically removed thomas frightening spider story was picked up by news outlets in australia then europe and eventually in the images sourced from thomas facebook circulated as well via news outlets on twitter and facebook 2014 nearly all the initial reports of it stemmed from the same source an article published by the australian news site nt news he said the trail had moved two or three inches higher they told him it was a small insect bite and gave him some antihistamine cream to rub on the red line it was a searing he said who told him that it was something out of the ordinary all the information contained in that article came from thomas himself thus unleashing on the internet that bane of the uncorroborated implausible story and not only was that story reminiscent of several other familiar urban legends that have circulated for more than a century such as those about spiders living or laying eggs under human skin but the reporting agency australian nothern territory nt news is one akin to america national enquirer or weekly world news the online version of a tabloid that publishes silly sensationalized articles such as obama gets croc insurance frog gets struck down by lightning and best man left bleeding after being hit in eye by flying dildo the story has since been published by more staid news sources as well or even any information suggesting that such an occurrence is possible christopher buddle an associate professor at mcgill university department of natural resource sciences addressed thomas claim in an saying that the story did wash with what we know about spider behavior unusual and likely not possible simply put it is not plausible and i can think of no valid reason why a spider might beneath skin through a scar the claim that it was and moving up through the scar tissue defies logic and defies what we know about the biology of spiders i am also sceptical because the the spider itself is not presented no corroborating information about this alleged medical case has been offered no pictures of the spider have been presented no doctors involved in treating the patient have been quoted and no witnesses to the spider removal other than dylan thomas himself have been referenced but in the absence of any other evidence we remain extremely skeptical about the tale as presented lauren no a spider did not burrow under a man skin and live there for days dani bunbury local discovered a spider had burrowed under his skin on bali holiday nt news 16 october 2014 orr aleisha spider burrowed into appendix scar crawled through wa man body the age 16 october 2014 woodcock mitchell bunbury man bali horror south western times 16 october 2014 dani bunbury local discovered a spider had burrowed under his skin on bali holiday nt news 16 october 2014 orr aleisha spider burrowed into appendix scar crawled through wa man body the age 16 october 2014 woodcock mitchell bunbury man bali horror south western times 16 october 2014 aleisha samsung has won the orders to produce apple s1 for the apple watch reports digitimes the s1 produced by samsung will combine multiple components including the processor mobile dram nand flash and other chips into one package noting that apple would be relying heavily on samsung for iphone 6 and apple watch components namely apple was said to be concerned about nand flash with its cheaper and slower tlc cell flash memory for iphone 6 and 6 plus models said to be the source of crashing issues those issues along with samsung competitive prices were said to be the primary reasons in bringing apple back to negotiations with the south korean company as the company is said to be refining the device watch os software and working on hardware components like the inductive charging mechanism apple retail store workers are also set to begin training during the week of february 9 ahead of the device launch the following month tag samsung

in a set of artist renditions 9to5mac offers a look at apple retina macbook air the renditions and details shared in the report are consistent with previous reports on the machine although plans do sometimes change during the development process the next macbook air will have roughly the same footprint as the current model but include a display nestled inside narrower bezels the machine keyboard will also extend from edge to edge while the speakers move to a set of grilles above the keyboard the new model will do away with nearly all of the ports currently found on the machine including the usual usb and magsafe ports instead the machine sides will include only a headphone jack a pair of microphones and a usb port that appears set to handle both connectivity and charging fanless design and perhaps come in multiple color options similar to the company iphone and ipad lineups the machine has been rumored to be entering production as soon as this month although it is unclear whether apple may wait until its worldwide developers conference in june to launch the device or introduce it earlier in the year
