the very first nonsense i had to debunk in 2014 was a claim that on 4 of that year a planetary alignment would cause gravity to decrease allowing you to float momentarily or fall more slowly if you jumped in the air at the right moment g this exact same hoax has resurfaced this week in a couple of places so decided to update the debunking to include some new links and repost it hopefully to stem the tide of silliness at end it seems fitting that hopefully this is also the last debunking make in but who knows still a week left now heard it that the caused earthquakes and that a magnetic pole flip of the earth will cause superstorms and another saying the earth is already physically starting to flip over we now have the claim that early next 4 2015 at pst to be to the combined gravity of jupiter and pluto you will be able to jump in the air and float for just a couple of seconds or at least fall more slowly depending on different this exact same hoax was pulled last year in 2014 by a site called news hound now offline apparently and a lot of people fell for it here we are again a year later back at the same spot this time the joke is being made by a site called daily buzz live which even bother to change much of the wording of the original hoax they even have a picture of a nasa tweet about the event and it was presumably made up wholesale for the article on daily buzz live whoever did it was clever adding the number of retweets and favorites but as fake as a 20 iphone you can buy on the street in new york city the physics of g is wrong the claim about pluto and jupiter is wrong this part is the real based on a joke made by an astronomer nearly 40 years ago spreading around facebook and twitter so much once again that i got a lot of people asking or telling me about it why debunking this thing again the claim on the morning of january 4th 2014 an extraordinary astronomical event will occur at exactly am the planet pluto will pass directly behind jupiter in relation to the earth this rare alignment will mean that the combined gravitational force of the two planets would exert a stronger tidal pull temporarily counteracting the own gravity and making people weigh less moore calls this the gravitational effect except this is all baloney to be polite ok so why is this wrong sitting in a tree the gravitational forces of the other planets in the solar system have essentially zero effect on you personally fine give some brief details the planets are big objects with lots of gravity but that only affects you if close to them space however is why we call it planets are far away this weakens their gravity on you hugely reducing it to less than the impact of the flutter of a wing then here you go even if you add all of the planets together they pull on you with a force less than 2 percent of that of the moon the daily buzz live article mentions tides too but even worse the combined tidal force from the planets is far less like percent of the simply put the planets are just too far away to have any real effect on you by the way the moon orbits the earth on an ellipse so its own gravity fluctuates far more than the combined strength of the planets every two weeks the gravity from pluto is weakest of them all pluto is a teeny tiny ice ball far smaller than even our moon and at its closest 4 billion kilometers billion miles from earth a long way a car on the road half a kilometer away has more gravitational pull on you than pluto does doing the math i find that the earth pulls on you about 200 trillion times harder than pluto does that about the same ratio as the number of cells in your body to a single cell so this claim that you can float is like saying you can shed a single cell and fly away by flapping your arms i checked on that day they are on nearly opposite sides of the sky really far apart about you have picked a much worse date to claim pluto was behind jupiter shame on you an enormously popular radio and television science program predated carl sagan and is still considered an icon of science in england as points out it was an april fools day joke moore made this claim in 1976 on his radio program to my complete unsurprise apparently some folks called in to say they did feel the effect this is called where you tell people in advance that feel something due to some cause and they will even if the cause never happened used by ghost hunters and ghost tour guides quite a bit to spook people before they actually enter a guaranteeing feel chills as they walk from room to room seen this myself first hand people can convince themselves of amazing things that never actually happened but i share it smart people fall for silly things all the time and intelligence really the prime factor here schools teach people how to analyze a claim how to tell if something makes sense on the surface of it or how to go about looking into the claim i knew right away to do the math and to see if pluto and jupiter really were aligned as the article says but all too often people think carefully or at all about these claims and simply spread them through social media all it takes is literally the click of a button pseudoscience thrives via this virulence whereas truth must take a harder path why i bother debunking stuff like this sure this is a silly claim and probably harmless in practice but not all of them are i already mentioned the from 2012 and i can tick off a dozen other doomsday or scary claims that spread due to a lack of skepticism and of course there are real issues like global warming denial and more which live and breathe and spread due to a lack of skepticism in the public i said particular bit of fluff will dry up and float away in a day or two but those others are here to stay for a long i was wrong and i known that something like this would resurface again in a year like the as big as the nonsense that comes back year after year my hope is that every time we take a moment to inject a bit of polite skepticism into everyday lives it makes the world a slightly better place to be we can change to

last week a social experiment video hit the web showing a secretly filmed homeless man using an unexpected gift of 100 to buy food for others since then the almost clip has been featured everywhere from the times to upworthy and generated over on a donation page managed by the video uploader youtube personality josh paler lin however homeless star thomas knew he was being followed and the whole thing is bullshit lin drove thomas to the liquor store taugan tan kadalim told vocativ claiming he was on scene when the video climax now seen over 28 million times was shot while i think the guy is homeless it is clear that from what i saw every part of that scene was staged who lives in an apartment complex directly across the street as he was walking out of the liquor store kadalim says he spotted lin sitting in the driver seat of a nearby vehicle and recognized him immediately from his previous prank videos i was like my god it him says kadalim adding that he subscribed to lin youtube channel i could believe it and behind him was the man who kadalim would later recognize as thomas the homeless samaritan lin claims was secretly followed with a hidden camera thinking the three men were about shoot a prank video kadalim decided to stick around and watch given how many of this year viral videos were hoaxes staged or otherwise bullshit it should hardly be surprising that this one might be too unlike those videos however this one has six figures purportedly to help thomas get a fresh start in questionably controlled donations attached lin denied any part of his video had been staged or scripted there is is no way we making this up lin told vocativ this is real

relatives of the more than 200 girls taken by militant group boko haram in chibok northern nigeria expressed hope yesterday that a ceasefire deal said to have been signed between the nigerian government and the islamist group will end their nightmare and bring their families home restraint appeared to be the order of the day with the details of any deal still hazy and no word yet from boko haram leader abubakar shekau wild celebrations might have been expected at the apparent end of an ordeal that has lasted more than six months but they were not in evidence with many cautious about what might happen but officials have made clear that the return of the girls is part of the deal said bana lawan chairman of chibok local government told the associated press community leader pogu bitrus told the news agency that people rejoiced but with caution taken from a school in chibok back in april could be released as early as tomorrow in neighbouring chad but reuters reported yesterday citing two senior government sources that the nigerian government would be looking to secure the release of the girls by tuesday a government spokesman said the authorities are inching closer to the release of the chibok girls he later told reuters that discussions will continue in chad next week and on the basis of those discussions we have more details on the girls release but we are still doing it with considerable caution boko haram has grown into such an amorphous entity that any splinter group could disown the deal he reportedly said the secretary general of boko haram who was named by president goodluck jonathan principal secretary hassan tukur as the boko haram representative in the talks ahmadu gave an interview to voice of america in which he confirmed the ceasefire that was officially announced by air chief marshal alex badeh the head of nigeria military forces on friday hence the trepidation on the part of families in chibok in july 2013 when a government minister announced an agreement shekau quickly denied it using a video message his preferred means of communication he said that whoever the government negotiated with did not speak for him and that he would never talk to infidels which gained the backing of politicians and public figures worldwide including the us first lady michelle obama summed up the mood obi ezekwesili a former education minister said in a tv interview on saturday but all the same we are hopeful she said according to the afp news agency the headteacher of the school from where the girls were taken asabe kwambura said she would be the happiest person in the world if the girls were to return leaving some to question the timing of the ceasefire announcement the president has also always said he would not release boko haram prisoners a central demand of the group but there has been speculation about such a deal some of whom have escaped back to their families in the months since they were taken many in the northern provinces where boko haram have killed thousands during their insurgency will be hoping the ceasefire holds however yesterday there were reports that suspected boko haram militants had killed several people in a number of attacks on nigerian villages that occurred after the ceasefire announcement security sources and witnesses told reuters

is kim jong un sister running north korea it impossible to confirm any of this including the rumor that kim little sister kim yo jong is the new but there is evidence that she has upped her political profile over the past few years and she may be one of the few people on the planet with direct access to north korea leader here what we been able to mine a mistress of former north korean supreme leader kim jong il kim jong un was the middle child of this relationship second to an older brother while kim yo jong is the former supreme leader youngest child dmitry astakhov presidential press press where they both attended school for some time and have a very good relationship michael madden who operates a blog called north korea leadership watch told mashable at one point the two appeared in the same school recital the political establishment of which kim jong un is the leader around 2008 when her dad still ran the country she reportedly worked to clear the way for her older brother to succeed her father once he died though that about all we know about their relationship by the time she was eight she was off to berne switzerland to attend school near where her older brothers were doing the same but not much is known about her activities until 2008 when she began to participate in the country politics in north korean politics madden said her father according to madden used to go around telling his friends about his daughter sharp political mind kim jong un younger to be now running dprk 2014 her role in politics is clear according to nk leadership watch when succession plans were finalized for her father eventual passing the powers that be reportedly gave her a significant part to play possibly a position within her dad personal secretariat or on the national defense commission and that carried over to her brother inner circle when kim jong un took the reins later that year she can see him in person that kind of thing madden said including his itineraries schedule logistical needs and security arrangements this past march state media reportedly listed her as a senior official within the party a first according to the blog but madden said that reports of turmoil at the top in north korea are probably exaggerated this is less likely to be a coup and more likely he said that kim yo jong is relaying her brother orders while he takes a break madden said very possible she could be running a lot more things than we

on friday the nigerian military reportedly agreed to a truce with the militant group boko haram according to the announcement more than 200 nigerian schoolgirls who were abducted this year will be freed according to cnn the details of the release are expected to be negotiated next week the militant group boko haram declared an islamic state in northeastern nigeria a territory largely occupied by the fighters boko haram is believed to be hiding the girls somewhere in this area 276 nigerian girls were kidnapped by boko haram militants from a school in chibok northern nigeria according to official figures the mass abduction occurred at night and it took days before the full scale of the kidnapping became clear shortly after the abductions a military spokesperson claimed that most of the girls had been rescued by nigerian soldiers but the remarks turned out to be wrong whether or not the nigerian army is suited to finding the girls has been questioned its reputation in the rural north is bad and it is often accused of lacking transparency and its soldiers of committing crimes one recent video allegedly showed nigerian soldiers slitting prisoners throats according to amnesty international criticism of the nigerian government and the military had quickly grown as they failed to free the girls in may boko haram leader abubakar shekau released a video message claiming that the girls would remain slaves with us and according to estimates more than 200 schoolgirls are still being held by boko haram militants however took place shortly after the abductions as this graph shows as time passed hope faded for many parents and reports of escapes became less frequent the longer they there the greater likelihood they become dispersed and the more difficult they are to track down jennifer cook director of the africa program at the center for strategic and international studies told time magazine this week before the reports emerged that boko haram was considering freeing them there are conflicting numbers of how many girls are still in captivity some say 215 some say 219 where the girls were kidnapped but its sphere of influence extends further into the west and south of the country 000 square kilometers or 193000 square miles its core area spreads over as much as 250000 square kilometers roughly the size of the united kingdom however boko haram is not in full control of most of the areas in which it is active and boko haram attacks are the main driver behind this rise the militant group has killed at least 5100 nigerians this year according to estimates of the johns hopkins school of advanced international studies this graph shows how fatalities caused by boko haram went up from around zero to more than 5000 annually within only six years it took until the april abductions for the conflict to make international headlines the burst of reporting was accompanied by a huge rise in attention to boko haram on social media about million tweets were posted using the hashtag bringbackourgirls according to the bbc most people who used the hashtag lived in nigeria 27 percent and the united states 26 percent still thousands of tweets are being posted each week in an effort to raise awareness about the fate of the nigerian schoolgirls more than 57000 users had retweeted michelle obama message our prayers are with the missing nigerian girls and their families it time to bringbackourgirls 2014 the white house said these personnel will support the operation of intelligence surveillance and reconnaissance aircraft for missions over northern nigeria and the surrounding area and aid in the search for the missing schoolgirls chad is east of nigeria other countries such as china france and britain have also sent military assistance to the region boko haram started to sell some of the kidnapped girls as brides to militants in may the value of a girl according to boko haram 12 the associated press cited reports of forced mass weddings which had taken place after the abductions in a video message boko haram leader shekau had reportedly announced i abducted your girls i will sell them in the market by allah the state department added shekau to its rewards for justice program offering up to 7 million for information that led to his capture those efforts have been unsuccessful a video which was released this month showed shekau alive and in freedom usaid the international development agency of the united states has devoted about 150 million to programs aimed at providing education to nigerian children and teenagers the state in which the kidnappings took place

claim an illustration created in response to the charlie hedbo attack titled break one thousand will rise was drawn by graffiti artist banksy january 2015 2015 artists from around the world shared powerful tributes in solidarity with the victims on social media one of these illustrations captioned break one thousands will rise was shared on the banksy instagram page 2015 at pst many assumed the illustration was created by the infamous graffiti artist however does not belong to banksy it is merely one of many imposter accounts falsely attributed to the mysterious london artist the break one thousands will rise illustration was actually created by illustrator lucille clerc break one thousand will rise charliehebdo jesuischarlie raiseyourpencilforfreedom lucille clerc lucilleclerc january 7 2015 clerc an illustrator based in london shared her artwork on facebook twitter and instagram on 7 january she also confirmed she created the powerful piece i do want it to turn into polemic and distract people from the real issues and in the end what matters is that this image speaks to people so the more it spreads the better it is i did expect it would have such an echo ideas do break ideas do die charlie became immortal yesterday and i hope that this terrible day will make us cherish and protect our freedom with even more wit and humour i can only hope it will inspire people to use their pencils too and that there will be thousands of drawings like this very soon

call it third law of apple analysts for every extreme reaction one way there is an equally extreme reaction the other what that means is that while some doomsayers are happy to write off the apple watch as the worst thing apple has done since building its own smartphone taking on the music industry with itunes insert actual bad decision others go in totally the opposite direction and predict a landslide victory in favor 000 apps ready to go when it launches in april and that 42 million units will have sold by the end of december 000 apps is based on his attending six apple hackathons over past few although i doubt that there will be plenty of apps ready to go on the day be frankly shocked if close to that number by comparison it took the ios app store 16 months to hit 100000 apps by which point it had seen approximately 2000000000 total downloads and in line with other reports pegging sales as likely to fall between million units in its first year on the market while 42 million would be a fraction of the number of units apple sells of the iphone it would still be enough to make it the runaway fastest selling new ios device in history the ipad by comparison sold million units in its first year while the iphone moved a relatively paltry million units noting apple watch extends iphone functionality and provides user convenience with and to an iphone user almost every current iphone user which are about 350 million users will also be an apple watch he writes since an average an apple watch user will have 100 apps installed and one way to think about it is that the consumer is getting 100 devices for 350 per he argues that we think about a for the apple watch as for others it is the social messaging or it is the navigation or it is the music or it is video or it is email so on and so forth debating on is the killer app for the is somewhat of thinking when the killer app used to be thinking of apple watch from the watch perspective is also fundamentally flawed the best watch on the market is probably a 3 app device it tells time may be day monday tuesday etc it may also have a stop it by april 10 2015 we are expecting 100000 apple watch apps on appstore currently on an average there are 65 apps per iphone we are estimating that an average apple watch will have 100 apps per apple watch there will be no single killer app for apple watch each user will have their own set of killer apps one way to think is that the consumer is getting 100 different devices in one apple for instance is outdated thinking to be the kind of mass market device it needs to be the apple watch will have to be all things to all people which is essentially what the iphone currently manages to be but no doubting his enthusiasm and at a time when apple can seemingly do no wrong who nicaraguan officials say a meteorite gouged out a crater near the nation capital city over the weekend but scientists are so sure 12 meters crater found near the capital managua international airport was blasted out by a space rock strike saturday night 6 the associated press reported which would be consistent with a meteorite impact but other details warrant a healthy dose of skepticism said bill cooke head of the meteoroid environment office at nasa marshall space flight center in huntsville alabama nicaraguan crater possibly caused by meteorite video cooke said and no one reports a fireball even though it was near midnight under scattered clouds managua is a big city with lots of potential witnesses to such a sight people saw a bright fireball the last time cooke can recall a meteorite blasting out a crater on earth in september 2007 near the peruvian village of carancas and that impact occurred in broad daylight both cooke and meteor expert peter jenniskens said i would expect meteorites to be found in and around the crater jenniskens of the search for extraterrestrial intelligence seti institute in mountain view california told via email and none are visible in photos of the crater cooke said he said the meteorite was likely relatively small about 3 feet 1 m wide if made of iron and somewhat larger if composed of rocky material cooke added which flew by earth on sunday 7 the ap reported but that is not the case experts said the event in nicaragua poss meteorite is unrelated to asteroid 2014 rc different timing different directions nasa officials wrote today 8 via the asteroidwatchtwitter account which is run by the space agency object office at the jet propulsion laboratory in pasadena california

not news a fabricated story coming out of north korea news it not north korea doing the fabricating which will feature dog meat on the menu what not being reported is well anyone ever saying that in the first place the reader mull through all the hot garbage being served up today by telling you exactly what we know and pointing out the news organizations that are spreading misinformation yes it fact or shite time according to cnbc it also gets yelp reviews and features noodles with bean paste and fried scallops yum but has no proof of a plan to do so let break down the facts in the sunday post article reporter gordon blackstock asks is dictator kim planning to open a restaurant in scotland he claims that north korea indeed has scotland in its crosshairs a particularly bad metaphor to associate with a militaristic dictator his source is a blogger with the north korea leadership watch which has no official ties to kim this blogger allegedly said that it would not surprise me if they opted to open a restaurant in scotland that blogger michael madden told the huffington post that the whole story is who did even write up the story on his own blog says that the use of his quote is misleading he told huffpost weird news in terms of the sourcing i have nary a clue this could come from local partners in scotland floating a trial balloon or deliberately disseminated disinformation if dprk entities are thinking of opening restaurants in europe the uk or the republic of ireland scotland would likely be on the short list which is what i said last week because it features the same quotes from madden and then the internet went crazy cnbc and edinburgh news aggregated it resulting in this reporter editor going absolutely bonkers trying to figure out why we did have this story we did have this story because it was never true scotland would likely be on the short list that cool but nobody ever said he plans to open anything heck even if he did the western version of the restaurant would feature dog meat like their north korean counterparts reportedly do we know this because the sunday post experts know this their experts being michael madden a blogger who would touch this fake story with a pole we be embarrassed but given the information we have now there no way we expect to see pyongyang in scotland

a woman from chengdu in china southwest sichuan province has taken an unusual approach to mending her broken heart spending a week inside kentucky fried chicken gorging on the food i just wanted some chicken wings but once i got in there and started eating i decided i needed time to think and was unable to go to work so we get a lot of people coming through at first no one really noticed her said jiang li lung 22 she said she was and just needed time to think and then asked for another box of chicken wings with extra large fries after a week local media begun to write about her said that she had decided to leave her job and took a train to her parents home in quingdao city in east shandong province she said who worked at kfc said the staff now miss her

balad iraq dizzy vomiting and struggling to breathe 11 iraqi police officers were rushed to a government hospital 50 miles north of the capital last month the diagnosis poisoning by chlorine gas the perpetrators according to the officers islamic state extremists and doctors said symptoms were consistent with chlorine poisoning although details on the other two incidents remain sketchy the reported assaults raise concerns that the militants are attempting to hone their chemical weapons capabilities as they push to seize more ground though officials and chemical weapons experts say the 2500 degraded rockets filled with nerve agents that remain there are unlikely to be fit for use weapons inspectors sealed them off with concrete in a bunker more than 20 years ago a common component in industry is sold legally but its use as a weapon violates the chemical weapons convention it was widely employed in trench warfare during world war i including infamously at ypres in belgium where german forces dispersed more than 160 tons of chlorine into the breeze killing thousands of french and allied soldiers said kasim hatim the director initially thought it might be a more serious gas a nerve gas or an the town had been under heavy assault for days according to the accounts of three survivors islamic state fighters had taken territory to the north cutting the only direct land access to the river town and had blown up the last bridge into the town all members of the sunni jabbour tribe which has turned against the islamic state were guarding a line in the north after an exchange axl rose is not dead despite internet reports to the contrary but that should come as no surprise to fans who by now have surely grown tired of the seemingly endless stream of online hoaxes falsely reporting the death of just about every major celebrity and plenty of minor celebs as well anyway story was headlined guns roses frontman axl rose found dead in west hollywood home at age and claimed that the to the singer was found dead after police were called to check on the former rock welfare the phony story on the ersatz msnbc site claimed the death of axl rose remained wrote the site mediaite in its story mocking the axl rose death hoax can go ahead and confirm which specializes in debunking rumors about celebrities dead or alive was among the first to expose the fakery which apparently fooled numerous internet users with its url which has no affiliation with the real news outlet and tries to fool people into clicking on bogus reported gossip cop people have been duped by this story to share it more than 39000 times on social media like facebook again this is totally fake pulled the same trick last month with a death hoax about macaulay culkin the phony culkin story is almost identical to the phony rose story believe any report coming from and hogwash rose is prank other celebrities victimized by death hoaxes recently have included cesar millan actor judd nelson and tv incredible hulk star lou ferrigno but they probably need to but one thing is certain axl rose may be the latest but will certainly not be the last celebrity to be the subject of a yet another tiresome online death hoax

woburn mass ap a time capsule was removed thursday from the head of a lion statue where it had long sat hidden in plain sight atop one of boston most famous landmarks it revealed at least one mystery a red hardcover book with no visible title or markings the contents of the book and the rest of the items in the box will remain a mystery for a bit longer as they were deemed too fragile to remove immediately which oversees the building had expected it to contain a potpourri of photographs and newspaper clippings from the period along with a missive to future generations penned by a group of boston journalists said brian lemay the society president noting little sign of mold or water damage historians had feared the contents could have been destroyed had the box been improperly sealed even as waves of tourists visited the building that once served as a fulcrum of british rule in the northern colonies and later as the first seat of massachusetts state government british soldiers opened fire on a crowd of protesters outside the building killing five in what came to be known as the boston massacre a craftsman who had worked on renovations to the building and was believed to have placed the box in the lion head and catalogued its contents a 1901 article from the boston globe surfaced later alluding to contents of a copper box which will prove interesting when the box is opened many years hence president of skylight studios in suburban woburn where the copper and lion statue had been brought for refurbishing archivist for the bostonian society speculated that the book could be a rogers family history but lemay was less certain he said but roscio explained that to avoid possible damage the contents must be removed and examined in a setting they could go on public display at the old state house later this year the society has also decided to leave one for the future made of titanium will be inserted back into the head of the lion suggestions on what to include are still being solicited lemay said but one item will be a medal from the 2013 boston marathon a symbol to future generations of the city resiliency in the face of tragedy

would you pay five grand for the luxury edition of the apple watch that the starting price that piper jaffray analyst gene munster sees in his crystal ball apple is expected to finally unveil the finer details of its apple watch including the price tags and launch date the company first smartwatch will be available in three versions apple watch sport apple watch and apple watch edition apple has already revealed that the sport model will start at 349 in the us but the company has been mum about the prices of the other two models munster said he expects that the price for the sport model could reach as high as 450 depending on different case and storage options the apple watch could start at anywhere from 499 to 549 and likely will come closer to an average selling price of 650 according to munster but the apple watch edition could break the bank starting at 4999 and potentially reaching closer to 7500 by factoring in expensive bands 999 price lines up with a projection from apple observer john gruber who forecast the cost of the version last september lg motorola microsoft sony pebble and other players apple product will be part smartwatch and part fitness and activity tracker a combination the company is counting on to bring in buyers but by offering the watch in a luxury edition apple is also presenting it as a piece of fine jewelry to further distinguish it from rival products estimating 8 million in unit sales this year compared with wall street forecasts of 14 million but the analyst believes next monday event will finally highlight the special features of the watch and start to excite the public a factor that will determine the ultimate price munster said he believes the elastomer bands for the apple watch sport will range in price from 29 to 39 leather bands could be priced from 49 to 59 steel bands could run around 99 and the gold bands for the edition may run into the thousands of dollars while the apple watch will contribute around 45 percent that leaves the luxury apple watch edition contributing pretty much nothing at least in terms of percentage but we believe that with the watch likely starting at 4999 apple might sell around 10000 units in cy15 calendar year 2015 of our total 8 million estimate munster said to put the 10k units in perspective piper analyst erinn murphy in conjunction with industry estimates believes that rolex sells watches per year thus apple at 10k in the first year would be about 2 percent the size of rolex we believe this is a reasonable potential first year size as consumers weigh the power of the apple brand other luxury watches and the of quickly depreciating technology in an apple watch other more traditional luxury watches that may hold value better

hear about the australian man who had a spider crawl into his body through his appendix scar and all the way up to his sternum as much as our collective morbid curiosity kind of wants it to be true scientists have come to lend some healthy perspective to the situation dylan thomas from bunbury in western australia says he found out that a spider had crawled into his body through his scar and had made its way right up to his sternum obviously once the venom started to affect my skin it was a really burning sensation like a searing feeling he told radio 6pr thomas was feeling worse and took himself to the hospital he says the doctors finally found the cause of his discomfort well after running tests and putting things inside my stomach they finally found out it was a tropical spider that been living inside of me for the last three days managed to get it out luckily he told his friends on facebook according to aleisha orr at the age and thomas could well be telling the truth as it was relayed to him at the hospital but lauren davis from io9 spoke to some scientists to get some perspective unusual and likely not arachnid expert christopher buddle from mcgill university department of natural resource sciences told davis simply put it is not plausible and i can think of no valid reason why a spider might beneath skin through a scar the claim that it was and moving up through the scar tissue defies logic and defies what we know about the biology of spiders i am also sceptical because the the spider itself is not presented but it was far more likely to be a tick or a mite just not a spider marie herberstein who is the head of the department of biological sciences at macquarie university in australia told davis but she was careful to not completely rule out the possibility she mentions that mites are also so perhaps it was just a really bit mite all we can do now is wait for the specimen which is reportedly sitting in a jar somewhere to surface

there an illustration being shared on facebook instagram and twitter that claims to be a tribute created by street artist banksy in response to the terrorist attack that killed 12 people near the offices of the french satirical magazine charlie hebdo in paris earlier today it almost certainly a fake not created by banksy and is actually a fan page that shares street art created by a variety of different artists rarely with any attribution twitter and instagram and you see plenty of popular accounts that seem to be official banksy pages the problem of fake social media accounts is so widespread that banksy has even posted on his official website to deny he runs any facebook or twitter accounts he does however have one instagram account which was used during his recent trip to new york the administrators behind the banksy pages also run a youtube account that popular viral videos to capitalize on their popularity he would want his work to be displayed in a way that makes it look bad and the often confusing similarity to other graffiti artists many works of art end up mistakenly labeled as created by banksy a handful of galleries and companies in the uk are however experts in his work meaning that they can verify prints purported to originate from banksy given today tragic events the sentiment is strong

jeny chang for buzzfeed via drug policy alliance data according to people with knowledge of the drug strategy who spoke on condition of anonymity but an official with one of the five district attorneys offices confirmed to buzzfeed news on monday that the change the official added that would still be cause for arrest but that having the drug in a public place would not but are expected to officially announce the new policy at a news conference on monday particularly teens from an arrest and all its attendant consequences including a night or more in he said which was first reported by the new york times would bring about a sea change in the way the city is policed marijuana possession accounts for a large percentage of the arrests a vast majority of which happen to young black or latino men living in poor neighborhoods lisa schreibersdorf executive director of brooklyn defender services told buzzfeed news get you fingerprinted this will be better for people who are vulnerable to collateral consequences like schreibersdorf cautioned that the policy will not fulfill its goal unless the nypd relaxes its identification requirements for summonses immigrants and teenagers often do not carry valid identification she said which often means that they can not be processed for a summons she added that the policy does not address the root cause of the problem namely that police officers in new york routinely stop people without probable cause but that mean they should be stopped in the first she said problem from my perspective is that stopping people without cause is which are issued to people who fail to show to court for a summons as the new york times reported up to a quarter of people issued summons fail to appear for their court appointments as a consequence there are currently million open bench warrants in new york city about one per every eight residents 000 arrests for misdemeanor possession in 2010 the only way to get arrested and charged with a misdemeanor for having less than 25 grams of marijuana is to display it public the legal definition of that term however is ambiguous can mean smoking pot in a public place but it can also mean that a police officer stopped you frisked you and pulled a small bag of marijuana from your pocket it has technically entered public view and the officer can legally arrest you and charge you with a misdemeanor even though you had less than the decriminalized amount this broad interpretation of helped marijuana possession become one of the most commonly used arrest charges during when a district court declared the policing tactic an unconstitutional form of racial profiling by 2013 the nypd was making only 28000 marijuana possession arrests still a large number but 47 less than in 2010 and slightly more likely to have tried it with dominantly white neighborhoods seeing fewer arrests than neighborhoods of color with similar incomes who as a candidate promised to end discriminatory policing they also drove ken thompson the brooklyn district attorney to announce in july that his office would no longer prosecute marijuana possession opting instead to dismiss most of such cases the nypd defended the high number of arrests with willam bratton de police commissioner saying that decision would not affect the approach to marijuana possession the policy to be announced on monday will mark the first time the current administration will take concerted action to address the disparities in marijuana arrests thompson said he was worried that the new policy could harm those it was intended to help by removing prosecutors from the picture this is because a prosecutor can opt to dismiss a misdemeanor but can not do the same for a violation prosecutorial review can cut both ways the institute analyzed data provided by the manhattan district attorney and found that black people and latinos were more likely to receive a sentence offer including a jail of prison than white defendants in similar circumstances the vera report found black people arraigned in manhattan were 19 more likely to receive jail or prison time than people from all other ethnicities by contrast defendants arrested in brooklyn could expect their cases to be dismissed the new policy is expected to standardize procedures across the city

such weapons might fall into isis hands of the democratic union party pyd asya abdullah told the kurdish question people have lost consciousness and are struggling to breathe and see we are investigating the situation but do not have the necessary technical equipment or expertise suffocation and skin victims also had moussa added who told him all victims were civilians though their border in the morning for further when several kurdish bodies appeared to show signs of blistering which led to death without any visible wounds or external kurdish health minister nisan ahmed told middle east review of international affairs journal the weapons could have come from an undisclosed syrian stockpile that used to belong to the damascus regime it was forced to dismantle and surrender stockpiles a year after the attack though the state department said that a of critical issues remain about the syrian president chemical weapons there have been several chlorine attacks in syria since assad was supposed to have surrendered his weapons cache chlorine is not banned under the chemical weapons convention but when used in large concentrations it can be weaponized symptoms of chlorine attacks include teary eyes a burning sensation in the throat the sensation of suffocation and a headache trying to consolidate territory from their headquarters in raqqa to the turkish border despite mexican authorities have discovered six hidden graves that may contain the bodies of more than 40 university students who went missing a week ago after clashing with local police in the violent state of guerrero on the outskirts of iguala mexico where a mass grave was found saturday european pressphoto agency burned beyond recognition were recovered from the muddy pits in the first series of exhumations he said it could take two weeks before identifications are made later state prosecutor inaky blanco said 28 bodies had been recovered in various conditions near a slum on the outskirts of the city of iguala about 80 miles south of mexico city they and supporters blocked major highways in the area for several hours we want them returned read a huge banner unfurled across the highway that leads from mexico city to acapulco iguala city police attacked a group of students rallying against government policies six people were killed more than two dozen injured and more than 50 students vanished about 15 students eventually were found hiding in their homes but 43 remained missing within days 22 police officers were arrested for what prosecutors said was use of excessive force at whose behest the police may have been acting he said that after the discovery of the graves an additional eight people were arrested he did not identify them it will suggest that they were summarily executed by their captors be they police or cartel criminals and if that proves true it would constitute the most egregious human rights atrocity in the government of president enrique peña nieto and one of the worst in recent years near iguala they had a contentious relationship with authorities and often spearheaded demonstrations the federal government dispatched army navy and national police to take over the search the federal office took charge of the case as soon as the graves were discovered late saturday tomas zeron head of investigations from the federal attorney office said 000 people are registered as having disappeared in mexico in the last eight years giving rise to an intense movement to find them most never reappear

nigeria military says it has agreed a ceasefire with islamist militants boko haram and that the schoolgirls the group has abducted will be released alex badeh announced the truce boko haram has not made a public statement with some 2000 civilians reportedly killed this year and their continued captivity has led to criticism of the nigerian government efforts to secure their release mediated by chad a government delegation twice met representatives of the islamist group he said ndjamena reports the bbc chris ewokor in abuja nigerian government spokesman mike omeri said boko haram would not be given territory under the ceasefire agreement and that the government would not reveal what concessions it would make including the chibok girls he said bbc news lagos this is a very surprising development president goodluck jonathan imposed a state of emergency in the northern states of borno yobe and adamawa vowing to crush the islamist insurgency or forbidden for muslims to take part in any political or social activity associated with western society which it sees as a symbol of western culture 053 civilian were killed in the first half of the year while amnesty international estimated that 4000 people were killed in violence including nigerian military operations in the first seven months of 2014 but its fighters often cross the long and porous border with cameroon reuters quoted the country defence ministry as saying cameroon nigeria chad and niger agreed to form a regional force to tackle boko haram militants

the apple watch is the most buzzed about wearable to hit the market in a long time and not all of the buzz is good we shared some of th earlier rumblings about the apple watch short battery life now we are hearing news of a new feature called power reserve which could be a mode that lets the apple watch run on low energy while only displaying the time the battery is significantly lagging behind the pebble time seven day battery life even before wearables came on the scene not everyone is diligent about plugging in their smartphones overnight one of the most frustrating things in the world is a dead battery when you need to check your email text or actually make a call then we must consider what happens with higher than average usage imagine if dynamic and draining apps are engaged then the battery has the possibility of lasting only until midday this means that the user will have to take his watch off to charge allure of a wearable is its instant notifications while your phone is tucked away in your pocket if the apple watch is on your wrist will you be drawn to look at the notifications a dead apple watch is even a watch it just an expensive bracelet perhaps the short battery life will be overshadowed by the army of apps and developers apple has at its disposal we let you know all the emerging details leading up to apple big event on march 9th 2015

a report on thursday claims the upcoming apple watch boasts a mysterious data connection port previously undisclosed by apple that is currently being used for diagnostics and testing the port features six brass contact dots and is positioned inside the bottom groove designed to accept apple aftermarket straps technically a connector is similar to apple lightning protocol which currently uses six of its eight leads for charging and data transfer but sources inside apple have confirmed its existence on what the publication believes are shipping versions of the device but points out that it could be used as a connection point for accessories in the future techcrunch speculates that such a data port could be used as a means to facilitate feature expansion perhaps smart bands that extend battery life or tack on gps and other sensing capabilities the initiative is an open platform that will let accessory makers build hardware like gps or heart rate monitoring but the port existence hints at interesting expansion possibilities assuming it ships as part of apple final design for example an expansion port could extend the watch lifecycle by offering users a road to upgrade features instead of purchasing a new device every year this would be especially helpful for buyers looking at expensive gold apple watch edition models

a few years ago it may have seemed rather impossible for the relationship between apple and samsung to improve but 2014 was and continues to be a year full of surprises after apple and samsung withdrew all patent infringement lawsuits except for those in the us earlier this summer the collaboration between the two tech giants seemed to have grown healthier industry sources suggest that this partnership will tighten even further as samsung is expected to supply more components for the giant for both the iphone 6 as well as the apple watch sources also consider the possibility that apple will reach out to samsung in order to employ the korean tech nand flash initial plans were to use nand flash for the iphone 6 but because the two companies have failed to agree on the prices apple has decided to use tlc nand flash in the 128 gb iphone 6 and various other components manufactured by sk hynix toshiba and sandisk on the 64 gb variant however since the tlc nand flash on the 64 and 128 gb iphone 6 and 6 plus proved to cause headaches sources say that apple might strike a deal with samsung in order to supply both the nand flash and the dram of iphone 6 units in addition some industry insiders speculate that both companies are currently jointly developing communications chips for the iphone the same report suggests that apple already discussed with samsung in regards to the supply of application processors for the wearable device which is set to hit the market in early 2015 no doubt

research released yesterday claims that the apple watch will the global smartwatch this year research firm strategy analytics predicts that apple will sell more than 15 million apple watches worldwide in 2015 to claim 55 percent of the global smartwatch market share share that will instantly make apple the number one smartwatch vendor for 2015 the remaining million units forecast for 2015 will be made up by all other smartwatch manufacturers said strategy analytics executive director neil mawston famous brand loyal fan base deep retail presence and extensive apps ecosystem will ensure healthy uptake for its including expected retail pricing expected battery life and accessories apple ceo tim cook recently revealed that development of the wearable is right on track and that the apple watch will go on sale in april including the huawei watch two variations of watch urbane and the new pebble time strategy analytics warns that apple may have a fight on its hands come 2016 mawston said example watch hardware design is arguably less attractive than some rival models such as the huawei watch battery life may not be as long as many traditional wristwatch owners are used to and premium pricing may be challenging for consumers apple will need to upgrade tangibly its watch to stay ahead of competitors later this saying it apple watch will sell millions from the start

apple watch will take approximately two hours to fully charge and deliver battery life with normal usage according to techcrunch those estimates corroborate a previous report that also claimed the apple watch will deliver battery life and support up to five hours of heavy usage per charge the watch must be on your wrist and locked they require contact with your skin there will be no dropdown notifications or constant pinging while off your wrist push notifications also cease when the battery reaches 10 percent those decisions speak to the care with which apple is handling notifications apple continues to tweak digital crown on the apple watch giving the button a weightier feel pressing and holding down the digital crown activates siri which the report claims works well and can be used for labeling directions and commands using a paired iphone the goal of the apple watch the report describes is to return some of your attention away from your smartphone by allowing you to communicate from your wrist on the go there are still several question marks surrounding the device that will change in less than three days when apple provides more details about the apple watch at its spring forward media event in san francisco the keynote begins on monday at 10 am pacific and macrumors will be providing live coverage of the event tag

famed nbc journalist tom brokaw thinks that nightly news anchor brian williams should be fired according to a report from the new york post page six which cited nbc insiders brokaw ire was prompted by williams admission that a story he has often repeated about being in a helicopter which was shot down during the 2003 iraq war was untrue the source told the paper is making a lot of noise at nbc that a lesser journalist or producer would have been immediately fired or suspended for a false most recently on a 30 broadcast he also told the story during an appearance on david letterman show dude i do remember you being on my aircraft i do remember you walking up about an hour after we had landed to ask me what had lance reynolds the flight engineer for the helicopter that was struck wrote in response prompting williams apology thursday or should lose his job or face some kind of sanction for the misrepresentation williams argued that it did not represent dishonesty saying rather that he a mistake in recalling the events of 12 years nbc news has made no official statement about the incident and has announced no investigations or possible disciplinary measures suggesting that the company is supporting the anchor and hopes to ride out the wave of criticism he is currently attracting the washington post reported an anonymous nbc executive told the paper has the whole support of williams also has the support of his esteemed colleague dan rather who defended williams thursday rather said in a statement provided to the huffington post he a longtime friend and we have been in a number of war zones and on the same battlefields competing but together brian is an honest decent man an excellent reporter and anchor and a brave one i can attest that like his predecessor tom brokaw he is a superb pro and a gutsy one

multiple users of anonymous web browser tor have reported that comcast has threatened to cut off their internet service unless they stop using the legal software comcast customer representatives have branded tor illegal and told customers that using it is against the company policies in theory makes all your internet activity private the software routes traffic through a series of other connected internet users making it difficult for governments and private companies to monitor your internet usage up to million people use the browser which became especially popular after edward snowden leaked information showing that the nsa was eavesdropping on ordinary citizens prior to that tor had been popular among people transacting business on silk road the online market for drugs and hitmen without letting others know what they were looking at but tor has been pretty popular with criminals identified only as kelly warned a customer over his use of tor software deepdotweb reports or cover themselves up on the internet are usually doing things that legal we have the right to terminate fine or suspend your account at anytime due to you violating the rules do you have any other questions thank you for contacting comcast have a great day speaking to deepdotweb claimed that comcast repeatedly asked them which sites they were accessing using tor comcast defended its actions seemingly asserting that it needs to be able to monitor internet traffic in case they receive a court order then we ask for a reasonable amount of time to notify the customer so they can decide if they would like to hire a lawyer and if they do then we turn the case over to them and they proceed with the judge directly and we step away

astronomers including experts at nasa have questioned whether the blast and crater reported earlier this week outside the nicaraguan capital were actually the product of a meteorite including information issued by the nicaraguan government suggested a piece of space rock broke off from a larger asteroid passing between the earth and its moon creating a sizable crater measuring roughly 40 feet across near managua international airport astronomers say the timeline does work out so the explosion and the asteroid are unrelated nasa asteroid expert don yeomans told national geographic there was no obvious optical fireball or debris trail seen prior to the explosion so it seems unlikely that the explosion in nicaragua was related to a meteorite impact head of nasa meteoroid environment office cooke says the energy needed to create such a crater would be the equivalent of a single ton of dynamite it would have generated a very bright fireball and nothing was reported despite the population cooke told today so i very skeptical and have asked the to help sort the whole thing out nicaragua desires to request the good offices of the us embassy to get the support of the us geological survey the country deputy foreign minister orlando gomez wrote in a letter to the ambassador in managua phyllis powers it packed a serious punch the government says its scientists recorded the impact at 24 seismic stations

apple was light on technical specifications in announcing its forthcoming watch earlier this month but one analyst has checked with the company supply chain to find component makers expect the final shipping product to include 512 megabytes of ram and a mainstream version with 4 gigabytes of internal storage which was provided to appleinsider claims that the 512 megabytes of mobile dram will likely be supplied by samsung hynix and micron arcuri believes apple may offer an version of the watch in addition to the standard version but he said the option will not likely be the default configuration he expects the memory will come from most major nand suppliers arcuri said he expects the apple watch to feature a wireless combination chip similar to the broadcom bcm43342 found in the iphone 5s interestingly that chip includes a gps radio which arcuri admitted is somewhat at odds with apple announcement where the company said the watch will require being tethered to an iphone in order to offer gps data but it possible that the chip could be a modified version that lacks gps or apple may simply decide not to enable the functionality in order to improve battery life the company has said it expects users will have to recharge the apple watch nightly nfc chips from both nxp and ams power management integrated circuits from maxim integrated products and dialog semiconductor a mems sensor from invensense microcontroller by stmicroelectronics and by skyworks but apple focused on the design and level of customization available in the forthcoming wearable device rather than specifications and storage capabilities even pricing remains a mystery with the company saying the apple watch will start at 349 but no breakdown of sizes or collections given fitness tracking support for apple pay and siri and will be the first apple device to feature wireless inductive charging

update the story has been updated to reflect new evidence and analysis from experts news has been circulating about a potential meteorite strike near managua nicaragua late saturday night just 13 hours or so before the close flyby of asteroid 2014 rc leading some to suggest that the two events are related however according to experts who have been examining the evidence including those at nasa the two events are completely unrelated and the explosion in managua may have nothing to do with objects falling from space an explosion occurred around saturday night in the city of managua which apparently produced a crater that was over 12 metres 39 feet wide and about metres 5 feet deep in a wooded area just to the west of the city international airport and just south of the highway from shows military personnel investigating the crater as well as the surrounding area for potential debris from the explosion officials with nicaragua institute of territorial studies inet which monitors earthquake activity in the country said that the event showed up on the agency seismic instruments wilfried strauch from inet said in a press conference according to agence afp you can see two waves first a small seismic wave when the meteorite hit earth and then another stronger one which is the impact of the sound while there have been reports of people hearing the explosion the scientists have the seismic data from it and they have the resulting crater there are parts of the story that just do add up flying underneath the planet from the perspective of someone in the northern hemisphere and while there is roughly a difference in the timing of these two events some saw a potential connection between these events it not entirely unreasonable to suggest this there are over 11000 known asteroids flying around the sun and very likely millions that we have detected and likely wo because they too small while most of these follow their own path as they circle the sun not all are alone some asteroids have tiny moons orbiting them some are best described as piles which are groups of smaller objects only barely held together into a shape by their mutual gravity others can be travelling along in with some members preceding or lagging behind the leader possibly due to an impact with another meteoroid or asteroid at some point so if one of these asteroid is flying by or an asteroid that still has debris from a past impact travelling along the same orbit it is possible that one piece could strike the atmosphere and survive to hit the ground just because two events an asteroid flyby and a meteorite impact happen close to one another does mean that they are related we saw this back in 2013 when we were watching asteroid 2012 da14 sweep by earth and suddenly a wide asteroid exploded over chelyabinsk russia the exact timing and traced orbits of these two objects quickly showed that they were completely separate objects and the timing was a just coincidence that appears to be the case for this event although the explosion was heard throughout the area apparently nobody witnessed any bright light associated with it when a meteoroid enters the atmosphere even if it is just a speck of dust it is traveling so fast typically around 17 kilometres per second or over 60000 that it heats up the air in front of it causing the air to glow brightly and produce the streak of light in the sky we call a meteor larger objects cause even brighter flashes earning them the name fireballor even bolide for an exceptionally large and bright one some of these are so bright that they can very briefly turn night into day as they pass overhead it would have been very difficult to miss such a fireball or bolide lighting up their night sky especially when it happened near a city of over 2 million people strauch said it was very strange that no one reported a streak of light we have to ask if anyone has a photo or something some 20 to 30 kilometres above the ground making them visible far and wide across the countryside professional meteorite hunter and host of science channel meteorite men tweeted his thoughts about the possibility of this being authentic he would expect there to be a very bright fireball sonic booms during the object dark flight and then the impact he also said that to produce a crater like the one seen it would have to be an iron meteorite as they are the densest and have formed the majority of known meteorite craters on earth donald yeomans the author of objects finding them before they find us said there was no obvious optical fireball or debris trail seen prior to the explosion so it seems unlikely that the explosion in nicaragua was related to a meteorite impact what was this if it was a meteorite one very real possibility is that it was a landmine explosion as there are still thousandsin cas buried throughout the country remnants of the war fought there in the 1980s it should be noted that fireballs blaze through our skies every day as tons of material is swept up by earth as the planet orbits the sun many of these are missed because they occur during the day or over regions of the planet that are heavily populated some countries have camera networks to capture these events with data being reported on sites like and the university of western ontario canada as an example there was a bright fireball that occurred just before this explosion in managua but it happened thousands of kilometres away across the atlantic ocean over eastern spain as shown in this animation taken from railway camera video note what appears to be a second object that may be a piece breaking off the primary one

days before christmas internet prankster josh paler lin set out to capture a simple social experiment on video the youtube star better known for his sex in bathrooms and mafia gags decided that give a homeless man named thomas 100 and then secretly follow him around to see how spend the money released on monday shows thomas as he takes a stack of bills and walks right into a liquor store but instead of booze the homeless man walks out with a couple bags of food heads over to a nearby park and starts giving it away to other people down on their luck moved by the selfless act lin then confronts thomas and tells him that being filmed the homeless man says get a happiness out of what social experiment lit the internet ablaze this week by saturday morning the video had topped 24 million views and earned its creator international headlines meanwhile the outpouring of support for thomas became so great that lin launched an indiegogo fundraising campaign to thomas get a fresh now netted more than 112000 it is that viewers should be skeptical of their creators until proven otherwise in the last year alone they have duped millions by staging videos of cops racially profiling muslims creepy dudes trying to take advantage of drunk girls and even a video of a heroic syrian boy rescuing a girl amid a barrage of bullets keeping these hoaxes in mind we reached out to lin on friday night we were left with even more questions and now has even bigger plans for the latest folk hero how thomas feels about all of this remains unclear after video exploded on monday he says he plucked thomas from the homeless shelter where been staying and put him up in a hotel the name of which lin will not disclose lin also says he has kept thomas from speaking to any media lin declined multiple times to let us speak with thomas though he claimed he was with him however lin insists that thomas is being well cared for over the last few days lin has published a number of photos on his militant group reported among them gill rosenberg according to the report prior to their capture islamic state fighters made three suicide bombing attacks against kurdish outposts killing some and capturing many others kurdish sources denied the reports saying rosenberg was in the area when it was attacked 31 a resident of tel aviv joined the kurdish troops against islamic state in northern syria earlier this month according to reports rosenberg said she had contacted kurdish fighters over the internet before traveling through iraq to train at one of their camps on the syrian border rosenberg immigrated to israel from canada in 2006 leaving behind a career as a civilian pilot and served for two years in the israel defense forces in 2009 she was extradited to the united states and jailed over an international phone scam one of her former lawyers said was training with kurdish guerrillas and would fight in neighbouring syria a lot like us really she told israel radio explaining her decision to enter the combat zone in northern syria known in israel by her hebraised first name gila was the first foreign woman to join syrian kurds in battle in addition to several western men who are fighting in their ranks we say after me let show isis islamic state what that means read a 9 post her lawyer said a 2009 fbi statement on the case names her as gillian rosenberg among 11 people arrested in israel in a phony prize scheme that targeted victims mostly elderly that she was estranged from her parents and had tried in vain to join the mossad spy service both in mind and in body said friend daniel lieber in massachusetts she has always been someone interested in politics and is very intelligence and business ties with the kurds since the 1960s seeing in the minority ethnic group a buffer against shared arab adversaries the kurds are spread through syria iraq turkey and iran israel has been cracking down on members of its arab minority who return after volunteering to fight with islamic state or other rebels opposed to syrian president bashar assad rule among them syria and iraq and officials did not respond to a reuters inquiry about whether the woman could face prosecution if she returns to israel

mike ditka adam schefter tom jackson keyshawn johnson jon gruden mike tirico stuart scott steve young and ray lewis all between the ages of 39 and 74 will sit at the table for a domestic violence discussion on espn zero women victims of domestic violence in america are most likely to be women aged lisa salters and on some weeks suzy kolber and word of the panel discussion began to spread across twitter piggybacking off of collins with headlines like these of ultraviolet on espn announcement that a 11 man panel will discuss domestic violence during their monday night football roundtable much less survivors of domestic violence the panel is the height of ignorance by espn espn must be getting their pr advice from their buddies at the nfl both the nfl and espn seem to greatly misunderstand the problem they are trying to address and the millions of people lives it effects we strongly believe that they should also include the voices of women and survivors of domestic violence at the table with nearly 45 of nfl fans and viewers being women including women at the table not only would add to the discussion but would address the realities of their audience and the issue at hand and will not be featuring any special discussion about domestic violence we reached out to espn pr who told us that talk of the special panel was false info and that tonight will feature a regular episode of countdown hosted by suzy kolber as has been proven in the past tonight however it highly unlikely that domestic violence will even come up there was no panel on domestic violence ever planned for tonight monday night countdown we will present our normal monday night football show with suzy kolber hosting and lisa salters reporting espn is proud of the work it has done covering storm jemele hill jane mcmanus kate fagan sarah spain and more

that the stainless steel apple watch will start at around 999 the edition however he places at 4999 high from the perspective of the tech industry but at the same time there is room for them to be this functionality will keep your first date enthralled for hours as you waft your apple watch before his or her mesmerized eyes but one who means to know where the world is at 999 apple still has the problem of obsolescence and general as gruber suggests be a nifty solution so that you do have to toss it in the drawer next to all your old iphones though is that apple is proving ever more that what is conventionally called tech is not its main domain as much if not more than we thinkers we sift the world through imagery rather than substance somehow substance is a more shifty essence than is our world of impressions substance takes time there are too many demands on our time for us to bother to dig deep into the substance of everything or even anything much at all so we sift our world by looking at it and absorbing impressions report says really however will likely be a certain substance that is unique to these fashion accessories this is what apple means when it says these are the most personal devices it ever made something that will be the glue that creates a deeper bond 999 or even more for a gold apple watch edition but you need it to be more than just a pretty face and that where apple hopes to make a killing

apple crushed its introduction of the apple watch yesterday in cupertino but while kevin lynch and jony were waxing poetic about the design of watch and its revolutionary ui there was one feature everyone steered clear of battery life apple was mum on how long its timepiece will stay charged according to a report from recode because apple is still trying to improve it ahead of the early 2015 release but sources say apple watch battery life currently last about a day and will require nightly charging but apple pr spokeswoman nat kerris told recode it should last you throughout the day but on par with most other smartwatches on the market no word on if the two different sizes will have different battery life as well the apple watch is expected to go on sale in early 2015 at an introductory price of 349 while the sport and edition models are expected to cost more

a devoted pet owner has spent on saving the life of his goldfish after it became constipated who has not been named took the fish to a veterinary practice in north walsham norfolk after noticing it was struggling to eliminate waste who has not been named took his goldfish pictured to toll barn veterinary centre in north walsham norfolk and paid for it to have a special operation after noticing it had become constipated 29 put anaesthetising agent into the fish water before using tiny instruments to remove two lumps from its body the pet went on to make a full recovery after the operation 29 was then tasked with carefully administering anaesthetic before using tiny instruments to remove a lump close to the fish backside although i have done it before on more valuable fish like a carp 29 pictured carried out the delicate operation on the constipated goldfish melbourne veterinarian tristan rich pictured head of exotics and wildlife medicine at lort smith animal hospital performed on a goldfish called george to remove a cancer tumour making it difficult for him to breathe and swim the tumour which had stretched down to the fish skull was cut out pictured melbourne veterinarian tristan rich head of exotics and wildlife medicine at lort smith animal hospital performed on a goldfish called george making it difficult for him to breathe and swim he was also unable to eat properly and the tumour was affecting his ability to see and decided to opt for the surgery which cost 200 the tumour which had stretched down to the fish skull was delicately cut out

stories are coming out of managua nicaragua that a large bang was heard by residents there saturday evening and it registered on seismic detectors as well a crater was found in the woods measuring something like 12 meters 40 feet across claims are being made that this was a meteorite impact a space rock a meter or so across slamming into the ground at high speed public speaker science evangelizer and author of death from the skies but my biggest doubts come in two parts expect a fireball around midnight been seen by a lot of people i heard any confirmed reports of witnesses also i seen any video from it either the situation in chelyabinsk in 2013 was different of course but video of that event showed up with an hour or two expect that after two days have some visual evidence from managua by now but not a bright meteor that came in over spain be fooled by hoaxes there are always lots of them when something like this happens the picture at the top of this post appears in a lot of hoaxes it was from a fireball over the netherlands in 2009 there should be debris in the crater at the very least on a microscopic scale i heard of any analysis of the soil there to look for fragments either too which again makes me a little more suspicious and be assuaged until we get much better evidence than has been reported so far add that some places are reporting that this may have been connected with asteroid 2014 rc which passed by the earth on sunday although this was a near miss 2014 rc got less than 40000 km from earth i am very very doubtful of a connection the asteroid passed at utc sunday which was noon nicaragua time 12 hours or so after whatever happened in managua incredibly unlikely that a small piece of that asteroid was that far ahead of the main mass and
