rumours that the caped crusader ride has been stolen have been greatly exaggerated said the scuttlebutt from sources in detroit is that one of the batmobile models being used in the filming of batman superman has gone missing believed stolen the internet went into a tizzy but later that day detroit police said the theft was a rumour woody said and director zack snyder tweeted an official photo on wednesday and is scheduled to open in theatres in 2016

the following is one of the most unusual media stories of the last year esquire magazine posted a blistering piece bashing espn written by the news editor ben collins it was entitled has a problem with the lead produced some exclusive details about coverage plans for monday night football namely the network would be having a domestic violence panel featuring 11 different voices all men our bold emphasis has been added a panel on a pregame show for monday night football will among other things address domestic abuse this panel will discuss once again the appropriate penalty for hitting a woman cris carter mike ditka adam schefter tom jackson keyshawn johnson jon gruden mike tirico stuart scott steve young and ray lewis all between the ages of 39 and 74 will sit at the table for a domestic violence discussion on espn zero women victims of domestic violence in america are most likely to be women aged lisa salters and on some weeks suzy kolber whether through his own sources or espn itself was never shared with esquire readers nevertheless the theme kept coming back throughout his piece as a tentpole of outrage and the anger towards it spread slowly throughout the weekend deadspin has a nice recap of how far the story reached as it was noticed on twitter and reblogged across the internet with one feminist organization even putting the network on blast based on the esquire article in a press release espn is not having an 11 man domestic violence panel tonight the network has explicitly and publicly called the esquire story false as documented below there was plenty to be skeptical about in story espn has covered domestic violence and the nfl at length while involving women in the discussion jane mcmanus has been a consistent presence on espn airwaves and espn has a deep bench of female commentators that have talked about the issue on the air you can criticize sports networks for not involving women in more prominent ways but espn at least appears to be trying to make an effort here mcmanus defended the network on twitter in light of those tweets no mention of suzy kolber who will be one of the hosts on monday night countdown tonight if any panel discussion happening tonight she be involved easy to make fun of espn and the gratuitously absurd amount of nfl analysts the network employs but who in their right mind would conduct an 11 person panel on a topic like domestic violence not something that even nancy grace and the cable news networks would be silly enough to do chris berman would be moderating an 11 person panel discussion on domestic violence including everyone from the game announcers to reporters nonsensical not even espn would be that dense they also highlighted contributions to their coverage of the nfl domestic violence crisis one of the highest on the espn executive food chain also disputed the esquire there was no panel on domestic violence ever planned for monday night countdown we will present our normal monday night football show with suzy kolber hosting espn is proud of the work it has done covering the issue of domestic violence and is committed to continued coverage much of that work has been informed by several talented female colleagues from our television and espnw platforms including hannah storm jemele hill jane mcmanus kate fagan sarah spain and more all between the ages of 39 and 74 will sit at the table for a domestic violence discussion on no ambiguity in that statement that point was missed entirely instead a lot of people have wasted a lot of time talking about an 11 men domestic violence panel that never existed

the islamic state isis operating in iraq does not have ebola the world health organization has confirmed a who spokesperson said they were investigating the reports we have no official notification from the iraqi government that it is ebola christy feig who director of communications told the website 2014 newspaper shafaq news agency and rudaw online newspaper reported a rumour of evd cases in mosul ninewa governorate who said in a statement the news was also relayed through other media agencies in and outside of iraq the ministry of health and the world health organization investigated the allegations through existing surveillance networks as well as through contacts with health authorities and medical sources in ibn sina hospital in mosul and that all precautionary measures are being taken to prevent the disease from entering iraq the virus plods on

maiduguri nigeria the leader of islamic extremist group boko haram has denied agreeing to any with the government and said more than 200 kidnapped schoolgirls all have converted to islam and been married off abubakar shekau dashed hopes for a prisoner exchange to get the girls released he said laughing there is no going he said in the video received by the associated press in the same way as previous messages air chief marshal alex badeh on 17 announced that boko haram had agreed to an immediate to end a insurgency that has killed thousands of people and driven hundreds of thousands from their homes in northeast nigeria a town of more than 200000 people fighting also continued friday in vimtin the nearby village where badeh was born along the lines of the is group in syria and iraq fleeing residents have reported that hundreds of people are being detained for infractions of the version of strict shariah law in several towns and villages under their control but 219 remain missing with talks hosted by president idriss deby and that it was confident the girls would be freed soon but boko haram has many factions who on thursday formally announced his candidacy for elections on 14 2015 in most populous nation nigeria with some 160 million people is divided almost equally between muslims who dominate the north and christians in the south the west african nation is the biggest oil producer on the continent and has its biggest economy though is expected to be the most hotly contested since his democratic party took power after decades of military dictatorship ended in 1994 losing the pdp its majority in the lower house of parliament but the coalition is weakened by its inability to choose a presidential candidate and primaries in december will be contested by three powerful northerners who all are muslim a christian from a minority southern tribe has been criticized for ignoring an unwritten party rule to alternate power between christian and muslim leaders adding a religious and ethnic dimension to the election

sons of anarchy get made into a movie a hoax article saying that creator kurt sutter will launch a film with charlie hunnam and brad pitt has gone viral a satirical news website except in cases when public figures are being satirized any other use of real names is accidental and 000 shares as of wednesday choose sam one person wrote in the comments section creator of the hit fx drama sons of anarchy has announced plans to turn the popular television series into a major motion picture who was also a writer producer and director on the series said in an interview with hollywood today magazine that he has long contemplated taking to the big screen following its run on television absolutely loved the show as did i and i have put a lot of thought into the matter and we are going forward with turning it into a feature sutter said from and in the process built a huge following sutter said the film will star charlie hunnam who played the lead character jax teller as well as ryan hurst who played opie winston and katey sagal as gemma teller the film which is a prequel to the storyline of sons will also introduce fans to father john who will be played by brad pitt

amazon is set to launch a free video service separate from its 99 prime instant video offering according to the new york post in case you having deja vu the wsj reported exactly the same thing back in march and amazon firmly denied it however the post confidently said that the offering is now a definite go one of its sources for the rumor is a potential advertiser which said amazon would unveil the service in order to increase its video share against netflix and ultimately tempt users into prime memberships by letting users watch a limited selection of prime shows with commercial breaks if the post report proves accurate the launch of a larger streaming service may mean that the current version successfully enticed amazon customers to buy prime amazon recently scored a deal to stream classic hbo programs like the sopranos and six feet under in a minor coup over netflix but it still has less than a tenth of its competitor size and we imagine that free looks pretty good to a lot of users ads or not so far amazon has commented on the matter but we reached out for more information though so let us translate that into for you no comment its full statement is below and there are display ads on some short videos such as movie and game trailers we often experimenting with new offers and experiences for customers but we have not announced any plans to offer an video streaming service

elected officials and activists in new york are reacting positively to the city new policy that loosens how it treats people found in possession of marijuana and asserted that punishment for what they considered a relatively minor crime could often affect a person entire future as well as the fact that many cities around the country are legalizing marijuana use it is timely for the city of new york to revise its policies said the rev al sharpton a new york activist in a statement hard drug trafficking and other criminal ills that have plagued our community i feel that the police ought to concentrate on things of importance rather than things that are now being legalized in many places around the country he said anyone found with less than 25 grams of the drug on them will be issued a summons rather than being arrested the administration of mayor bill de blasio announced monday the only caveat is there must not be a warrant out for the person arrest and they must not be found near a location that presents extra concern such as a school according to the city de blasio said today action is the latest in a series of steps commissioner bratton and i have taken to rebuild the relationship between the nypd and the communities they serve we are also enhancing public safety with this new initiative by directing police resources towards more serious crime and not wasting officer time processing unnecessary arrests who said in july that he would not prosecute marijuana possession cases because of the concerns about how such arrests can affect the lives of young minority men they jointly sent a letter to the mayor and police commissioner bill bratton calling for an end to such arrests read a joint statement from the council members ritchie torres rafael espinal carlos menchaca antonio reynoso and donovan richards and we will continue to monitor its implementation the council members said the relationship between police and communities particularly communities of color frayed significantly during the previous administration today announcement will make substantial progress towards rebuilding that relationship we look forward to working with the mayor and commissioner to implement additional measures needed to restore trust between police and communities

longtime nbc nightly news anchor tom brokaw reportedly wants his successor brian williams thrown out of the big chair after he admitted fabricating key portions of a story he repeatedly told about his reporting experience during the iraq war in 2003 citing sources at the network reported that brokaw 74 has been making a lot of noise at nbc that a lesser journalist or producer would have been immediately fired or suspended for a false report williams described how he was traveling in a group of helicopters forced down in the iraq desert on the ground williams said he learned the chinook in front of him had almost been blown out of the sky he showed a photo of the aircraft with a gash from a grenade and his story evolved over time williams said that his helicopter had come under fire from what appeared to be iraqi farmers with grenade he said a helicopter in front of his had been hit in a 2013 appearance on david letterman late show on cbs williams said that two of the four helicopters he was traveling with had been hit by ground fire including the one i was in williams recanted that story claiming he was that he was flying in a chinook helicopter behind the formation that took fire however on thursday the military newspaper stars and stripes which broke the story reported that williams was actually flying with a different helicopter company altogether in a different direction and linked to the attacked unit only by radio the post reported that brokaw and former nbc news president steve capus who left the network in 2013 knew that williams updated version of his tale was not true before the anchor admission wednesday evening the paper also says nbc news executives had counseled williams to stop telling the story the paper says nbc will take no action against williams believing that his apology wednesday will suffice one source told the paper he has the full support of nbc news

on monday morning a report surfaced claiming that comcast has been discouraging customers from using the tor browser a browsing program designed to allow users to surf the internet with greater anonymity than most browsers report was repackaged on a number of other sites stating that comcast has declared war on the tor browser the report goes on to suggest that comcast has contacted some users telling them that they risk disconnection if they continue using tor the report may have generated a lot of clicks but is totally inaccurate or any other browser for that matter we have no policy against tor or any other browser or software customers are free to use their xfinity internet service to visit any website use any app and so forth web surfing or online history just like other isps more information about these policies can be found in our transparency report here which is a educational and voluntary copyright program read more here as i have myself sure many of them are using it right now

comcast has lately found itself issuing public apologies on a somewhat regular basis as subscribers share tales of horrible customer service the article said comcast agent named jeremy allegedly called tor an the comcast agent told its customer that such activity is against usage policies the comcast agent then repeatedly asked the customer to tell him what sites he was accessing on the tor browser the customer refused to answer the next day the customer called comcast and spoke to another agent named kelly who reiterated that comcast does not want its customers using or cover themselves up on the internet are usually doing things that legal we have the right to terminate fine or suspend your account at anytime due to you violating the not just a few as noted by cato institute research fellow julian sanchez and security researcher robert graham who wrote on twitter comcast spokesperson charlie douglas told ars customers are free to use their xfinity internet service to visit any website or use it however they wish otherwise the company monitor browser software or web surfing and has no program addressing the tor browser douglas said comcast has admitted fault and said its customer service agents acted in error in this case comcast says it investigated the story and found no evidence that the encounters ever happened douglas said per our own internal review we have found no evidence that these conversations took place nor do we employ a security assurance team member named kelly we respect customer privacy and security and only investigate and disclose certain information about a customer account with a valid court order or other appropriate legal process vp of internet communications and engineering also disputed the report in a blog post today our customers can use tor at any time as i have myself sure many of them are using it right now he wrote comcast customers who are caught by comcast pirating material are by comcast and told to cease the activity comcast will continue monitoring them and if they violate the strikes plan five more times their internet service will be terminated six strikes reports are the result of content companies monitoring online activity and notifying internet service providers of potential violations comcast says it uses and alerts to educate customers about copyright violations but it does cut off service nonetheless the deepdotweb report was credulously by a few other news outlets that did seek further confirmation the stories are being shared by twitter users who often add expressions of outrage it was created by the us naval research laboratory to protect government communications and is used by many people with privacy concerns including activists in countries with repressive governments for anyone hoping to use tor to mask downloads of pirated material the tor project itself says that file sharing is widely unwanted in the tor network and exit nodes are configured to block file sharing traffic by default comcast was caught interfering with bittorrent traffic in 2007 it possible they were being notified of a pending legal action deepdotweb quoted comcast as saying if asked by a court to provide customer information then we ask for a reasonable amount of time to notify the customer so they can decide if they would like to hire a lawyer and if they do then we turn the case over to them and they proceed with the judge directly and we step away since the reports mentioned no specific customers we love to hear about your experiences in the comments

matt taibbi the star magazine writer hired earlier this year to start a satirical website for billionaire pierre omidyar first look media is on a leave of absence from the company after disagreements with inside omidyar organization a source close to first look confirmed today reportedly to be called racket which first look executives had previously said would launch sometime this autumn amid much fanfare taibbi website was meant to be the second in an envisioned fleet of titles to be published by first look an ambitious digital journalism company funded by omidyar the founder of ebay and one of the richest tech moguls in america like its counterpart the intercept launched earlier this year by glenn greenwald and others to pursue investigations of nsa surveillance and the intelligence world it was a venture centered around a polemicist without much management experience prior to joining first look taibbi made his name by gleefully skewering fat targets for rolling stone most famously he described goldman sachs as a great vampire squid wrapped around the face of humanity and he said at the time of his departure that he was lured away by the chance to lampoon the financial industry in the simultaneously funny and satirical voice associated with the legendary magazine spy over the succeeding months the mission of the publication broadened to encompass political satire as well and it brought on a number of names from the new york digital scene including deputy editor alex pareene formerly of salon laura dawn a digital video producer who formerly worked with and edith zimmerman founding editor of the hairpin funny mean people taibbi told new york in an interview in march it appropriate for their antagonistic adversarial role many of whom took a similarly adversarial approach to journalism over the last year however the center of gravity of the organization has shifted as omidyar and his silicon valley braintrust have exerted control over budgets and vacillated over the journalistic mission over the summer omidyar appointed a longtime confidante john temple a former newspaper editor who previously led an civic journalism venture in hawaii to be the president for audience and products putting him in a position above eric bates the former rolling stone editor who was brought on as a first look editorial director who is close to taibbi the confrontational approach that made taibbi name at rolling stone and before that as the founding editor of the gonzo moscow expatriate magazine the exile appears to have contributed to internal trouble at first look only returning on one brief occasion to address the staff although those hired have been reassured that the project would continue on during the unspecified term of taibbi absence the launch date for racket which taibbi indicated in september would be coming in a month now appears to have been pushed off said temple who is based in san francisco when reached by phone this morning i comment about internal matters and i comment on personnel matters i mean a private company so why would we no which omidyar founded last year originally in response to the disclosures of nsa surveillance leaked by edward snowden to greenwald and his intercept colleague laura poitras omidyar initially committed 250 million to the project and began laying plans for a large general interest website and a number of more narrowly focused digital magazines in july the billionaire announced he was scaling back the plan for the time being choosing instead to focus on racket and the intercept as prototypes for a new technological model of journalism the intercept has lately been publishing vigorously breaking several major stories federal investigators are reportedly pursuing the alleged leaker responsible for a story on the site about the government voluminous terrorist watch list but racket has been much slower to materialize leading to rumors of staff anxiety temple told me taibbi site was experimenting with a variety of journalistic approaches not just satire and humor but also investigative journalism for instance ellen miller head of the campaign finance watchdog the sunlight foundation a nonprofit also heavily financed by omidyar met with the staff over the summer to discuss how it might dig into issues of money in politics temple told me he building a team and there great esprit in matt team the site is apparently still hiring

miami the bulletin now falls squarely in the pantheon of unconfirmed phenomena along with sightings of the loch ness monster and the breakup of brad pitt and angelina jolie it will be true but on friday for the umpteenth time miami was distracted by the rumor that castro 88 who has survived revolution assassination attempts countless cigars substantial stress a fall after leaving a stage and a stomach ailment had finally succumbed said james cason the former head of the united states interests section in cuba from 2002 to 2005 and now the mayor of coral gables a wealthy enclave in county must have died 20 times since the time i went to the versailles restaurant on calle ocho and other cuban establishments to ponder the possibility that this time maybe maybe it would be true but even here in a city still fixated by castro rumor fatigue was obvious versailles had put its game plan into action assigning some parking spots to local tv and radio stations but few showed up a restaurant in westchester a stronghold said manolo alvarez 75 a retired painter laughing as he held court with his friends in front of the cuban cafecito counter eventually it will happen no one is immortal and he will join the ill health long absence from public view and shift from rumor mill to hyperspeed twitter feed make even debunked stories effortlessly spreadable in fact determining the provenance of each rumor has become a kind of parlor game the story probably stemmed from a simple the death of a namesake in a faraway country fidel castro odinga the son of a prominent kenyan politician raila odinga died on sunday and was eulogized on thursday a similar mistake occurred in august 1997 when a cuban revolutionary figure rene orley sanchez castro died in cuba spawning a swirl of speculation around the world the one on friday was bolstered by tantalizing circumstantial droplets the last time castro was seen in public was 9 2014 making friday the first anniversary of his disappearance and castro never at a loss for words had failed to comment about announcements by his younger brother raúl and president obama that the united states and cuba would resume diplomatic ties where castro reportedly will be buried were being repaired in fact too mentally and physically frail to be seen or to speak cason said of cuban officials they want him to be remembered as strong and vigorous they want him to be the state department had to beat back a flurry of reports and questions from miami about apparent death the sources of the speculation were varied and dubious a ham radio operator in havana a nurse in cuba who telephoned a friend in miami a report by an astrologer off and on and then accelerated after castro vanished for a stretch in 2006 and once again after he relinquished power to his brother raúl in through the years castro has been rumored to have been stricken by heart attacks brain hemorrhages strokes and cancer he has alternately delighted in and derided the many attempts to him off as he joked once in 1997 i am happy to send my compatriots and friends around the world this short film castro said in 2006 after his absence his death when it is finally confirmed will be historically momentous and for most cause for jubilation the city will dust off its contingency plans even some private schools have early dismissal emails to parents at the ready to a certain extent death will also be anticlimactic years ago his death was seen as the necessary prelude to a democratic cuba and a return home for tens of thousands of exiles with raúl castro firmly in place that is no longer the case or even when he was just fading it would be said peter hakim a cuba expert at the dialogue center in washington was almost a personal battle not to let fidel win now i think people are beginning to accept that fidel has won he will go to his grave with the government intact and the backing down from its unalterable commitment to unseat the regime he

by benjamin kang lim and tony munroe oct 9 reuters north korean leader kim jong un is in firm control of his government but has hurt his leg a source with access to the secretive north leadership said on thursday playing down speculation over the health and grip on power north korea state media which usually chronicles kim whereabouts in great detail has not made any mention of his activities since he attended a concert with his wife on the source said that kim hurt his leg while inspecting military exercises he ordered all the generals to take part in drills and he took part too they were crawling and running and rolling around and he pulled a tendon the source told reuters on condition of anonymity he injured his ankle and knee around late august or early september while drilling because he is overweight he limped around in the beginning but the injury worsened the source said kim who has rapidly gained weight since coming to power after his father died of a heart attack in 2011 had been seen walking with a limp since an event with key officials in july which would imply he may have aggravated an earlier injury kim needs about 100 days to recuperate said the source whose information could not be independently verified kim jong un is in total control said the source who has close ties to pyongyang and beijing friday is the 69th anniversary of the founding of north korea workers party an event kim has marked in the past two years with a visit to the pyongyang mausoleum where the bodies of his father and grandfather are interred if kim does not turn up it could fuel speculation over the state of his health and whether he may have been sidelined in a power struggle experts said the longer he remains out of the public eye the more uncertainty about him and the status of his regime will grow said curtis melvin a researcher at the institute at the johns hopkins school of advanced international studies in washington not kim first absence north korean officials have denied that kim public absence since early september is and a official following north korea said this week there were no indications he was seriously ill or in political trouble it remains unclear why a leg injury would keep kim out of the public eye for so long although this is not the first time he has been missing from public view in june 2012 six months after coming to power state media failed to report on or photograph him for 23 days he the next month at a dolphinarium speculation that kim unusually long absence from public view may be due to ill health was fueled by a north korean tv report late last month that said he was suffering from discomfort some pyongyang watchers also suggest that kim may have been sidelined in a power struggle a scenario they say was reinforced by the unexpected visit on saturday of a delegation to the closing ceremony of the asian games in incheon south korea another interpretation of that visit holds that it was meant to convey stability in pyongyang the source with knowledge of kim jong un health said rumors of a coup were rubbish it would have to be a very subtle coup indeed not to disrupt international travel plans said andray abrahamian of the choson exchange a ngo running a program for north koreans in southeast asia north korea is a hereditary dictatorship centered on the ruling kim family kim sister kim yo jong is known to have an official role within the ruling party his brother kim jong chol and his estranged are not in the public eye kim was absent from a 25 meeting of the supreme people assembly or parliament the first he has not attended since coming to power three years ago however kim name has not disappeared from state propaganda thursday edition of the workers party newspaper the rodong sinmun carried three letters to kim from overseas allies on its front page and has reported on returning athletes from the asian games who thanked the marshal for his support during the competition abrahamian said it was unlikely kim had been usurped kim jong un has always shared power with other key figures and even if the internal balance of power has shifted it is unlikely that they would want to remove him given his unmatchable symbolic value again though everyone is guessing he said additional reporting by james pearson editing by mike and raju gopalakrishnan

a video of an airport worker stripping naked to go through a security scanner in protest at security guards has gone viral 31 who works at the airport in the city of st petersburg in northwestern russia had finished his shift and was going home when he remembered he had left his keys at work he said i returned back to the airport and was just in the section where trains arrive with passengers when i was stopped and asked to remove my belt before going through a scanner and security guards were just being they called police so georgy then stripped off everything before walking through the scanner at st petersburg pulkovo airport but later realised the video had been leaked and he become an online hit a spokesman said we are looking into the matter and have nothing more to say at this moment adding i know that they just leaked it in order to embarrass me but i will have the last laugh

speculation is mounting that one of the senior taliban detainees swapped for a us army prisoner of war has returned to militancy following a leak to cnn on or off the record if true it stands to plunge the obama administration back into an acrimonious debate about its prisoner exchange for sergeant bowe bergdahl and its aim of closing guantánamo bay the california republican who chairs the house intelligence committee said in a statement he can not confirm or the report jack langer said classification restrictions would not permit additional detail on whether the taliban member actually committed a terrorist or militant act nor which is believed to be the subject of the speculation but said that as part of the oversight responsibilities it would scrutinize the issue said dustin walker a spokesman who could not confirm the allegation he noted that panel chairman senator john mccain expressed concern in the past about the potential for these prisoners to return to the mullah norullah noori mohammed nabi khairullah khairkhwa and abdul haq wasiq all detained at guantánamo since the early days of the afghanistan war were placed under monitoring of the emir of qatar in exchange for bergdahl they were not returned to afghanistan and are not believed to be there now which occurred in late may 2014 have not been disclosed but the taliban five were said to have been required to remain in qatar for one year the obama administration has said from the start that assurances provided by the emir gave the us sufficient visibility into future activities and potential threats from the five men national security adviser said after the deal was finalized that all the five not pose a national security intercepted communications from the suspected detainee indicate he has reached out to his taliban comrades to encourage additional attacks in a war in which the obama administration has drawn down us forces approximately 10000 us troops remain in afghanistan with residual and training missions but said to be no longer taking part in major combat the bergdahl swap drew criticism from congressional republicans several contended that releasing the five senior taliban from afghanistan was a price too high for bergdahl whom the taliban captured in 2009 following a murky decision bergdahl apparently made to leave his base in eastern afghanistan house republicans in particular blasted the us defense secretary chuck hagel for failing to notify them as required by law 30 days before the intended trade which the administration indicated would have jeopardized the deal the army is investigating whether he should be charged with desertion this week it batted back media reports that it had decided he would be himself a prisoner of war for five years in vietnam has not criticized bergdahl but he said when the trade occurred that the senior taliban were people possibly responsible for the deaths of in his statement warned that if obama continued with his intended transfers of detainees from guantánamo will be a steep price to pay very likely in american the former administration envoy for closing guantánamo underscored intention to redouble efforts to shutter the controversial facility before his presidency ends fulfilling a pledge additional transfers are expected in the coming sloan who left the state department on 31 december told the guardian the administration was prioritizing the transfer of detainees already deemed by six agencies including the military and intelligence leadership not to pose significant national security risks

it not exactly legalization but in new york city it could become the next best thing tickets for marijuana possession instead of arrests the new york police department nypd is planning to announce new guidelines that would allow those found in possession of small amounts of marijuana to walk away with a ticket instead of spending time in handcuffs the change in policy could also have a significant impact on the city black and hispanic community which some studies say are disproportionately affected by the police department current marijuana arrest policy which the report says is something of a throwback to the city policy in the late comes just days after alaska oregon and washington voted to legalize cannabis joining colorado and washington events that may point toward a national trend

new footage of the elusive yeti captured amid the snowfields of russia is sparking renewed debate about the existence as some see definitive proof while others claim the video is nothing more than a publicity stunt traveling to the adygeya republic after local news detailed sightings of the creature according to the daily mail the yeti had reportedly been spotted just an drive away from the city of adygeisk after arriving in the area the team interviewed witnesses at a local mountainside lodge who claimed to have seen the yeti local witness andrei kazarian recalled we see anyone we saw its huge footprints they were 5 to 6 centimeters deep and come from a human foot we took a plaster cast of them and we estimate that it probably would have taken about 200 kilos to press the snow down that though markedly different looking like a bear but not a bear from the door seen something big and and in russia http 2015 the group were stunned to hear crunching snow before spotting the yeti moving through the trees as the mirror reports they claim to have then captured footage of the yeti evidence that has since been handed over to local scientists for analysis with some observers claiming that the sighting is nothing more than a stunt designed to bring tourists into the russian town others however have asserted that the clip represents genuine proof of the existence 2015 a dna study conducted by oxford professor bryan sykes failed to identify definitive proof of the yeti from hair samples as the inquisitr previously reported however sykes was quick to assert that the study was meant to systematically examine yeti evidence not pass judgement on its existence most famously in the united states where the creatures are known as bigfoot or sasquatch in russia they are called either almas or yeti names which may denote two distinct species

reuters historians on thursday opened up a time capsule that had been hidden in a statue of a lion atop boston old state house and discovered a small red hardcover book tucked inside a copper box but bostonian society president brian lemay pronounced himself absolutely thrilled by the find which was not expected the year the capsule was placed in the statue atop the building had described its contents as including letters from elected officials and buttons from the presidential campaigns of william mckinley and theodore roosevelt old state house located in downtown boston is near the site of the 1770 boston massacre which set the 13 colonies on the path to revolution and is a common stop for tourists visiting the city

a humorous report on a satirical web site done in the style of china state broadcaster cctv offers advice to chinese on how to choose their english names english names come with different connotations not always fair to those people but they do the article warns a name can come with a or idea about what sort of person you are and where you come from who was not to be outdone by skycoolz have fun and pick a random object or word as a name but avoid them if you want a call back from that serious law firm in america the post chides it offers this guide the jock are still and the are called it good to avoid food as a name it suggests names like candy lolly sugar think anything sweet are typically thought of as names or names einstein or madonna and going to get some stares it says you have some pretty big shoes to fill there worldviews once was served by an employee whose badge confusingly read franco mussolini one hopes he did harbor similar dreams of power and domination it also hard not to appreciate the playfulness with which these names get chosen often chinese people pick an english name as a play of words based on their original given chinese name the atlantic offers a few examples from the city of hong kong for example has carson as his english name singer lee english name is hacken another singer chan is called eason a journalist got his name another way when i was a student everyone kept saying my chinese name really fast until it started sounding like lok he said referring to the cantonese pronunciation for so cola stuck our names are our names and we have little choice in the matter but the practice of adopting a new english name can be seen as an exercise in especially in societies where larger trends of conformity hold some sway the post says in fact by a satirical news site

when apple released the first iphone it only came with apple applications apple opened the app store which allowed developers to make applications for the iphone uber snapchat etc a lot of people expect a similar thing is going to happen with applications from developers at least initially they say apple is limiting what apple watch apps are capable of doing early on in order to ensure a smooth launch and maintain battery life saying to themselves do have an option to fail on this sumit mehra cto of app studio y media labs told business insider so apple is limiting all this nice stuff all these sensors nfc haptics heartbeat sensor gyrometer everything apple is only going to allow developers to do the basic stuff to just get the apple watch out there because either it not ready or they do know what the implications of something like this could be so apple is preventing developers from using these sensors in their apps to avoid launching a device with a lineup full of apps and they want every app out there on the apple watch using these sensors because all of a sudden this watch will only give you four hours of battery life and then not a watch anymore if i have to charge my wrist every four hours though apple has promised it will open up watchkit later this year for now apps offload all the heavy lifting and computations to the tethered iphone which saves battery and gives developers access to the iphone powerful processor talk to your iphone through app extensions and present summary information in what apple is calling glances who has been developing a tesla companion app for the apple watch at eleks says the limitations have presented a challenge for developers matsekh told business insider we saw lots of fun stuff during the apple presentation and in its description and marketing materials but we find a way to implement them in real life we had a vision of what like to achieve and in the end we had to get rid of lots of features because they just possible in the current state of watchkit but says the current limitations mean not as cool as like it be but much more limited than expect he says the circular knob used as input on the watch as a way for users to control the interior temperature of their tesla apple guidelines however state that you can only use the digital crown for scrolling or system features so they had to scrap that and go with a solution matsekh says that may have been the reason behind this not that they have the time or resources to make these features available i think it was a conscious choice to limit customization to make the apps follow the guidelines and make them simpler for users y media labs cto sumit mehra says as a developer do i like it probably not but do i like it as a user absolutely because at the end of the day i want to be charging my watch twice a day and nobody knows how long the apple watch will last before it needs a charge developers are estimating between 19 and 24 hours but apple has yet to announce specifics one thing is for certain if this watch live a day it have any chance of survival

a new survey from ubs suggests that the apple watch could get off to a strong start leading the investment firm to predict sales of 24 million units and gross profit of billion from the wearable device in its first few months alone 000 consumers ubs found that 10 percent of consumers said they are very likely to buy a smartwatch in the next 12 months applying that same percentage to the total number of eligible iphone owners ubs believes apple will sell 24 million apple watches in its first nine months of availability analyst steven milunovich noted that the first version of the apple watch has a number of limitations most notably its dependence on a connected iphone for functionality but he believes the device will set up apple for success in the wearables market in the first few months milunovich believes apple will sell 24 million of its watch with an average price between 420 and 430 that would result in sales of billion and with an assumed 33 percent level of gross margin would add billion in profit to the company bottom line for fiscal 2015 so milunovich estimates do include the 2015 holiday shopping season milunovich estimates increase to 40 million units resulting in 17 billion in sales and billion in profit and by 2018 his projections call for apple to be selling million apple watch units in a single fiscal year much like the mac and ipad but he said it also possible that the apple watch could eventually become the successor to the iphone the company has to be concerned about the threat of replacement technology whether it be a leap in handset technology or loss of key functions to wearables mulinovich said with a sophisticated user interface and apps coming on apple may be readying for the time when the apple watch encroaches on the smartphone market and found that for now consumers are more interested in the currently available samsung gear among respondents who plan to buy a smartwatch 37 percent said they would purchase a samsunggear while 25 percent said they are waiting for the apple watch when the apple watch becomes available and shakes up the existing wearables market we expect apple watch to become first to mind in smartwatches he said

official celebrates wider range of identities and expressions protects young women from sexual violence elon university has dropped the term from its vocabulary and replaced it with a move made official this fall and implemented in everything from its website to orientation workshops private liberal arts college in north carolina was done to promote inclusivity celebrate diversity and ensure the campus did not promote sexist stereotypes or create a hostile and unsafe environment for female students campus officials said in interviews with the college fix director of community said in an email to the college fix that she has been told by some that they believe the term is outdated and that replacing with is a of royster stated may contribute to sexual violence on campus because it labels the youngest students causing them to be targets royster said the rates of sexual violence perpetrated against women on college campuses it is useful to examine any use of a term that suggests that a group of people just entering college might be targets for such violence in any she said away from language including pronouns that denote a gender binary will be something we see more and more as our culture evolves to celebrate a wider range of identities and administrators made it clear that incoming students must be called no public announcement was made regarding this change administrators relied largely on word of mouth to carry the news an orientation leader told the fix that each time an orientation leader said in training he or she was immediately corrected not schukraft said were very adamant about using the correct terminology and stressed the importance of using language that would make the new students feel not all incoming students were comfortable with this change schukraft said multiple incoming students approached her saying they were more comfortable with the term vice president of admissions and financial planning said in an email to the college fix that the change improves the campus environment and is a more appropriate description for new students he added some believe is a term and elon is attempting to move away from gendered stereotypes elon strives to incorporate language that is current and reflective of our student zaiser said in an email to the college fix necessarily wrong but not completely applicable to entire population which includes internationals transfers spring admits along with traditional students beginning their first year on a college

reuters north korean leader kim jong un is in firm control of his government but has hurt his leg a source with access to the secretive north leadership said on thursday playing down speculation over the health and grip on power which usually chronicles kim whereabouts in great detail has not made any mention of his activities since he attended a concert with his wife on 3 and he pulled a tendon the source told reuters on condition of anonymity the source said who has rapidly gained weight since coming to power after his father died of a heart attack in 2011 had been seen walking with a limp since an event with key officials in july which would imply he may have aggravated an earlier injury said the source whose information could not be independently verified said the source who has close ties to pyongyang and beijing an event kim has marked in the past two years with a visit to the pyongyang mausoleum where the bodies of his father and grandfather are interred it could fuel speculation over the state of his health and whether he may have been sidelined in a power struggle experts said the more uncertainty about him and the status of his regime will grow said curtis melvin a researcher at the institute at the johns hopkins school of advanced international studies in washington although this is not the first time he has been missing from public view six months after coming to power state media failed to report on or photograph him for 23 days a scenario they say was reinforced by the unexpected visit on saturday of a delegation to the closing ceremony of the asian games in incheon south korea said andray abrahamian of the choson exchange a ngo running a programme for north koreans in southeast asia kim yo jong is known to have an official role within the ruling party his brother kim jong chol and his estranged are not in the public eye or parliament the first he has not attended since coming to power three years ago kim name has not disappeared from state propaganda the rodong sinmun carried three letters to kim from overseas allies on its front page and has reported on returning athletes from the asian games who thanked the marshal for his support during the competition it is unlikely that they would want to remove him given his unmatchable symbolic value again though everyone is guessing he said

san francisco google bought six office buildings northwest of its silicon valley headquarters from starwood capital group llc and blackstone group lp in a 585 million deal two people with knowledge of the matter said the properties are part of the pacific shores centre office park in redwood city california about 18 kilometres from main office in mountain view said the people who asked not to be named because the transaction is private the company said in its quarterly report filed on thursday that it bought land and buildings for 585 million without details the acquisition extends a real estate deal spree as google owner of the largest search engine expands hiring and makes acquisitions this month the company signed agreements for a total commitment of about 1 billion through 2028 according to the filing expect to continue to hire aggressively for the remainder of 2014 google said in the filing will also remain an important component of our the company had employees as of 30 september up almost 19 from a year earlier the filing shows meghan casserly a spokeswoman for google declined to comment beyond the filing tom johnson a spokesman for barry starwood capital in greenwich connecticut and peter rose a spokesman for new blackstone declined to comment the silicon valley business journal reported this month that google was close to completing a deal at the site fitness centre the properties google purchased comprise about square feet of class a office space as well as a fitness centre that includes a gym pool and spa according to the people with knowledge of the matter more than half of the million square feet of office space at the complex the office building addresses are 1200 1300 1600 1700 1800 and 1900 seaport the people said pacific shores centre is a waterfront campus that was developed by san jay paul in the early 2000s it lies about halfway between san francisco and san jose the campus which includes sports fields and a park is next to restored wetlands that are part of the san francisco bay wildlife refuge starwood capital bought pacific shores centre in december 2006 near the height of the market from its developer and walton street capital llc and immediately resold two of the buildings starwood capital paid about 833 million in the deal its first office acquisition in the san francisco bay area blackstone in 2011 bought an 80 million junior loan on the office complex at a discount in an effort to gain ownership if starwood capital defaulted two people with knowledge of the purchase said at the time blackstone then gained an equity stake in the properties sold to google through a loan restructuring blackstone through its equity office unit has major office holdings in northern california and is the us office landlord after brookfield property partners lp bloomberg

journeyman golfer dan olsen retracted claims tiger woods had been suspended by the pga tour for using drugs after both the pga tour and woods agent mark steinberg vehemently denied the claims courtesy of bob harig everything i said on that radio interview was only my opinion and not based on any firsthand knowledge or facts olsen told i want to make a full retraction to everything i said for the entire radio interview and i apologize to tiger nike phil mickelson commissioner tim finchem and the pga tour olsen claimed on 730am the game in lansing michigan that woods had been suspended for a month due to the use of peds and that an exempt player he did name had revealed the information he also claimed that woods used a cheater ball but it something else olsen told the station per harig i think when it all said and done he gon na surpass lance armstrong with infamy unequivocally and completely false said steinberg in a statement earlier courtesy of harig they are unsourced unverified and completely ridiculous the pga tour has confirmed that there is no truth to these claims executive vice president of the pga tour added that there is no truth whatsoever to these claims we categorically deny these allegations the pga tour told harig that if a player tested positive for peds they were required to announce the suspension while any punishments for recreational drugs remain undisclosed or opinions are certainly inflammatory and it remains to be seen if he will be reprimanded woods has only had his character called into question by critics for his past transgressions while his professional achievements were still held in esteem

our lives with his comment was reported this week by many news media outside italy with dozens of articles in the united states it was veritable catnip to social media it turned out the pope had not made the comment who died in 1978 once said reportedly while comforting a child whose dog had died one day we will see our animals in the eternity of christ and in this case it was not done father ciro benedettini and in this case it was not done the vatican deputy spokesman father ciro benedettini said on saturday when asked about how the media ran with the story whose headline was misleading when the topic was the transformation of all creation into a new heaven and a new earth it cited the remark about animals and attributed it to paul vi but its headline said the pope and animals is open to all creatures which ran a story on thursday about the purported comment by francis acknowledged its mistake saying in a correction on friday that it had misattributed the remark by paul vi to the current pope cnn also corrected its story noting the misattribution and saying it was unclear what francis believes about pets going to heaven a spokeswoman for cnn had no immediate comment he has not spoken much about them in public but benedettini said that from the general tone of his speeches and gestures it is clear that he is in spiritual harmony with all of creation francis willingly let a young girl place a lamb on his shoulders as a shepherd would carry it the pope once told priests that a good pastor should know not only the names of his parishioners but also the names of their dogs benedettini said pope john paul implied that animals had souls because they too were created from the breath of god in 2008 former pope benedict upset some animal lovers when he said only humans were called to eternity

in a horrifying act of revenge for airstrikes in northern iraq militants with the islamic state extremist group have beheaded american journalist james foley and are threatening to kill another hostage officials say where president barack obama has resisted launching airstrikes or deploying significant american firepower foley family confirmed his death in a statement posted on a facebook page that was created to rally support for his release saying they have never been prouder of him said the statement which was attributed to foley mother diane foley she implored the militants to spare the lives of other hostages like jim they are innocents they have no control over american government policy in iraq syria or anywhere in the world 40 from rochester new hampshire went missing in northern syria in november 2012 while freelancing for agence and the media company globalpost the car he was riding in was stopped by four militants in a contested battle zone that both sunni rebel fighters and government forces were trying to control he had not been heard from since upping the stakes in an increasingly chaotic and multilayered war the killing is likely to complicate involvement in iraq and the obama administration efforts to contain the group as it expands in both iraq and syria which beheaded many of its victims including american businessman nicholas berg in 2004 next to a militant with a knife to his throat foley name appears in both english and arabic graphics on screen after the captive speaks the masked man is shown apparently beginning to cut at his neck the video fades to black before the beheading is completed the next shot appears to show the captive lying dead on the ground his head on his body the video appears to have been shot in an arid area there is no vegetation to be seen and the horizon is in the distance where the sand meets the sky a militant shows a second man who was identified as another american journalist steven sotloff and warns that he could be the next captive killed sotloff was kidnapped near the border in august 2013 he had freelanced for time the national interest and medialine and two other officials said the victim was foley all three officials spoke on condition of anonymity because they were not authorized to discuss the killing by name the mosul dam and the kurdish capital of irbil which has become a key front for the islamic state as its fighters travel to and from syria the military has struck at least 70 islamic state targets including security checkpoints vehicles and weapons caches it not clear how many militants have been killed in the strikes although it likely that some were the extremists have slain soldiers and civilians alike in horrifying ways including mounting the decapitated heads of some of its victims on spikes and has not released their nationalities in its annual report in november the committee concluded that the missing journalists were either being held and threatened with death by extremists or taken captive by gangs seeking ransom the group report described the widespread seizure of journalists as unprecedented and largely unreported by news organizations in the hope that keeping the kidnappings out of public view may help in the captives release rik stevens in rochester new hampshire and zeina karam in beirut contributed to this report

james foley went missing in november 2012 an american journalist kidnapped in syria more than 18 months ago whose authenticity could not be immediately verified was posted online tuesday and quickly spread on social media the video which appears to be the work of the militant group islamic state of iraq and greater syria declares the act message to america from the islamicstate and retribution for the united intervention against isis in iraq some versions of the video and twitter accounts circulating it were quickly taken offline tuesday evening though the video soon appeared on youtube again a freelance journalist who has written for time among other outlets and has been missing since august 2013 the post read be patient until we all have more information and keep the foleys in your thoughts and we are appalled by the brutal murder of an innocent american journalist and we express our deepest condolences to his family and nsc spokesperson caitlin hayden said will provide more information when it is near the turkish border the fbi said in an alert following the 22 2012 kidnapping he was in binesh covering the syrian civil war for the globalpost website and afp 40 grew up in new hampshire where his parents live

drug offenders in new york city could soon find themselves on the receiving end of a ticket instead of inside a jail cell if a policy change on marijuana possession is adopted this week the move would overwhelmingly affect black and latino residents who represented 86 percent of marijuana possession arrests in the city this year according to the marijuana arrest research project but there is a chance that the policy which new york city mayor bill de blasio is expected to announce monday could boomerang the strategy would require anyone caught with a small amount of marijuana likely to be defined as 25 grams or less to be issued a court summons instead of being handcuffed arrested and fingerprinted but doing so means those summonses would not be subject to prosecutorial review which would identify if a summons was justified in the first place legal experts say when an arrest is made the charge becomes a court case reviewed by a prosecutor a prosecutor could throw out the charge or refuse to prosecute should he or she see any indication that the arresting officer violated due process such as searching a backpack without probable cause prosecutorial reviews a screening function to weed out legally insufficient jeffrey fagan professor of law at columbia law school in new york told international business times under the new policy function has now been he said who announced earlier this year that he would stop prosecuting marijuana violations the brooklyn office has dismissed 849 misdemeanor marijuana cases that involved arrest out of 2526 such cases since july according to the new york times allowing police officers to write tickets without accountability creates serious concern that many summonses will be issued without the safeguards currently in thompson told the times cases will move forward even when due process violations might have adding possibly thousands of cases to the docket some 28000 people were arrested on minor marijuana charges in 2013 issuing arrest warrants for all the people who fall sick or can not miss work on the day of their summonses would put more stress on an already overburdened system not solving the problem that trying to fagan said counties and cities across the country have done at various times over the past several decades new york decriminalized the possession of small amounts of marijuana in the law made possession of the drug a ticketable offense and applied to marijuana that was out of public view and was not being smoked nevertheless police have continued to arrest people and charge them with misdemeanors after finding small amounts of marijuana in their pockets or belongings at this point not arresting people for weed would be progressive it be catching up with the mainstream gabriel sayegh the new york state director of the drug policy alliance told vice

a news agency has released a video purportedly showing military aid airdropped by us forces and meant for kurdish forces defending kobani being captured by islamic state isis militants instead which has been besieged by jihadists after a fierce military assault armed isis fighters show several boxes containing weapons munitions and grenades that were allegedly airdropped by us cargo planes and were from the iraqi kurdistan government grenades can be also seen in the video which was published by amaq news agency the us military said it had air dropped weapons ammunition and medical supplies to kurdish forces defending kobani in a statement the us central command said us cargo planes made multiple drops of arms and supplies that were provided by kurdish authorities in iraq in order to allow kurdish forces to resist isis assault and take full control of kobani the director of the intelligence agency of the kurdistan government 24 tons of small arms and ammunition and 10 tons of medical supplies were delivered to kurdish forces in three us planes

his voice served as a call to action an echo that continues today whenever a kid bellows the word into a microphone it was in henry bank lyrical wobble the way he rapped through the sugarhill delight the singular hit that propelled a movement when it was released in 1979 57 died tuesday morning after complications from cancer but his influence remains the business manager for the two surviving members of the original sugarhill gang guy and wright created a devastating rapped big bank hank on a boast that codified one of central themes little did he know at the time how accurate he was and that through said devastation hank was introducing a flow that in the decades to come would move through culture one boasted rhyme at a time

big bank hank performs with a violet hat and a the hearty emcee grooves as he rhymes though it may be lost in music with a fluid pelvic wobble next to the more restrained wonder mike and master gee he is personified hank embodies his verse as he raps of superman with a funny line belittling the manhood it no match for there big bank hank he raps again he had no idea how true that was though he witnessed the music evolution over the following decades as the style he helped popularize become a form as vital to the story of american music as jazz and country and western from the same verse part of a larger bit involving a sexy reporter further underscores his import said heard stories and heard vicious on the mike and the that little turn of phrase carved into wax ongoing with turntables and microphones the gang harnessed the titular brass and bongo breakbeat while they shouted jump on it kemosabe jump on it big bank hank then made another claim the one who shot jesse james

after all got his start in the business as a bouncer and managing an act that would become the cold crush brothers he landed a spot in the sugarhill gang when the late music executive sylvia robinson tapped him to be part of a rap trio she was putting together stop describes the song as standing out amid rap of the time due to the birth as a studio creation raps on were the stuff that sounded good not in the parties but on the live bootleg cassettes playing in the oj cabs and on the the funny stories the hookish slang the same kind of stuff that would strike listeners around the world as both universal and new not local and though tough to confirm in the era which began in 1991 and various litigation involving the unapproved sampling of further blurred the issue of numbers and sugarhill gang failed to sustain a bankable career and receive royalty checks equal to its influence in the years following the track success the style morphed in dozens of different directions though becoming politicized through grandmaster flash and the furious five through afrika bambaataa and popularized through and the beastie boys and the circuitry leads back to rapper delight and by extension big bank hank his phrasing his fluid funky tone has endured passed down from rapper to rapper an invisible but essential presence

once again rumors of the death of former cuban leader fidel castro have spread across the exile community and across social media a publication read mostly by cuban exiles reported thursday that the cuban government had called a press conference amid speculation about health the cuban government later disputed the report saying no such press event had been planned according to correspondent in havana though they have not yet been confirmed 2015 this is not the first time fidel alleged death has taken over the internet in 2012 rumors of his death began circulating after news that venezuelan doctor jose rafael marquina said the former leader had suffered cardiac arrest and was in a vegetative state almost like a ritual fidel castro is killed several times a ramos wrote on twitter according to fox news latino his absence at major events like the 56th anniversary this week of entry into havana after the victory of the cuban revolution or the return last month of three cubans convicted of spying in the have led some to believe that his health has worsened castro has yet to comment on the historic resumption of diplomatic relations with the united states for the first time since 1961 announced by both governments last month the most recent reflection as fidel castro columns are called appeared in october 2014 an impressive train of thought and exceptional kenyan opposition leader raila son fidel castro odinga was found dead in his home in nairobi on 4

after multiple delays the launch of the apple watch will be put off until early next year rosenblatt securities senior research analyst brian blair said friday said blair it is kind of a strange period but the more production gets pushed back the later it going to launch it looks like right now february is the best shot they have blair said that the majority of the issues apple is addressing with the delay are internal one of which is battery life he said that going to be a problem for a lot of consumers three days where you do have to charge it every single night when you go to bed that will ultimately bring more consumers to the product

a mcdonald burger bought 20 years ago has an uncanny resemblance to its modern day counterpart twenty years ago opening statements in the oj simpson trial were being heard a company called aol rolled out internet service and two aussie blokes purchased a hamburger from a local mcd two of those three things changed dramatically one did and in another 20 years that burger offering will no doubt still be going strong in all its wrinkled glory friends casey dean and eduard nitz only 13 and 14 years old at the time bought some burgers at an adelaide mcdonald two decades ago they ate their burgers but a quarter pounder with cheese they bought for a friend went uneaten or the burger turned into a bit of an inside joke either way the teens turned into adults but the burger refused to age dean said it started off as a joke you know we told our friend we would hold his burger for him but he never showed up and before we knew it six months had passed 20 years later the burger looks the same as the day we bought it perfectly preserved it its original packaging dean said threatening to finally take a nosh even though it was for charity the trustees of the burger just could bring themselves to bite into it can you blame them all of which begs the question exactly what is in a mcdonald burger that keeps it looking the same 20 year later

you may have a seen a story going around facebook that promises you be able to float in the air on january 4th as a result of a planetary alignment that will decrease gravity for 5 minutes unfortunately it is total bullshit a fake news site that admits it occasionally publishes works of complete fiction and it being widely shared because it includes a tweet from nasa that boosts its apparent credibility the agency said in a statement to microgravity exists only off earth the crews aboard the international space station live and work in microgravity where they conduct science experiments that take advantage of this unique environment aboard the orbiting laboratory temporary microgravity can be created using aircraft flying in parabolic arcs pointing out that he had to debunk the exact same rumor last year after it was passed around by a different fake news site not only that but it actually based on a hoax that been around for 40 years cited in dailybuzzlive article was actually a notable british astronomer and he did actually make the zero g day claim in what the piece leaves out is that it was an april fools day joke pluto and jupiter are aligning on january 4th and it would matter if they did because they much much too far away to exert the kind of gravitational force the fake article describes doing the math i find that the earth pulls on you about 200 trillion times harder than pluto does that about the same ratio as the number of cells in your body to a single cell so this claim that you can float is like saying you can shed a single cell and fly away by flapping your arms although you wish them success in their future endeavors they will sadly remain every bit as earthbound as usual on jan 4

it appears that there may be a serious bug with the reset all settings option in ios 8 causing users who activate the feature to lose all of their iwork documents stored in icloud drive according to multiple posters on the macrumors forums using the reset all settings option under general reset has caused documents to be permanently deleted from icloud drive and it is meant to reset all user preferences to the default settings that the option is deleting icloud drive documents appears to be a serious bug though it may be limited to apple own iwork apps like pages keynote and numbers one user had all of his iwork documents wiped by using reset all settings while other app information remained in icloud using reset all settings deleted all iwork documents stored in icloud drive on the iphone and on after allowing time for syncing to a mac running os x yosemite all of the documents disappeared from that machine as well preview and textedit documents which can not be accessed on the iphone remained untouched on the mac and several people who have been affected by the bug are now in contact with apple support in an effort to retrieve their documents a mavericks user was however able to recover his files from a backup folder and os x yosemite users may also have luck with recovering files via time machine while another said his account had been placed in troubleshooting mode to attempt to recover the data icloud drive is apple answer to storage services like dropbox icloud drive allows users to store a variety of documents like spreadsheets pdfs images and more accessing them on any device currently os x mavericks users can access icloud drive documents via but icloud drive will be fully functional in october after os x yosemite is released in order to avoid accidentally erasing important documents stored in icloud drive ios 8 features

cristian bale is eyeing or if you prefer the role of apple founder steve jobs the ipod and the iphone in sony upcoming biopic the times has confirmed the hollywood reporter broke the news trainspotting is directing the film which may be called jobs from a script by aaron sorkin who won a screenwriting oscar for the facebook drama the social network released by sony in 2010 sorkin screenplay is based on walter isaacson bestselling biography steve jobs acquired by sony around the time of jobs death in october 2011 and gone girl director david fincher was in talks to helm the film at one point the jobs biopic still faces questions particularly over whether audiences will continue to be fascinated by jobs while no doubt a towering relevant figure in both technology and culture those two areas are characterized by swiftly moving currents and it remains to be seen where mass interest lies when the film eventually comes out sorkin said at a 2012 newsweek and daily beast event that the entire movie is going to be three scenes and three scenes only that all take place in real time he added each of these three scenes is going to take place before a product launch backstage before a product launch the first one being the mac and the second one being next after he had left apple and the third one being the ipod
