there are christmas miracles after all the miracle came in the form of a plain white envelope containing a handwritten note from their son telling them he had paid off their mortgage a successful app developer from new york who goes by the youtube user name joeytrombone on thursday shared a video showing his heartwarming reaction to his incredibly generous christmas gift an app developer from new york center surprised his parents this christmas by giving them a present which has been viewed nearly 130000 times in the last 24 hours and counting begins with joe riquelme sitting on a couch with his parents and their pet dog riquelme tells his mom and dad that he has one more christmas gift for them a slightly envelope folded in half there are documents from bank of america accompanied by a handwritten note that reads house is paid off merry xmas joe riquelme drew a box with a list of three things his parents had done for their family with check marks next to each one raising kids college loans mortgage riguelme mother covers her mouth in shock and bursts into tears of joy mingled with laughter as her son labors to keep his composure who also begins to weep papi riquelme mom exclaims through sobs while showering him with hugs and kisses riguelme later wrote on facebook along with this collage from the video riguelme later wrote on his facebook page last year riquelme founded the new startup videoshop a app available for the iphone riquelme founded the new startup videoshop a app available for the iphone

abuja nigeria the leader of nigeria islamist extremist group dashed hopes for the release of 200 kidnapped girls saturday denying reports of a truce with the government boko haram leader abubakar shekau says the schoolgirls have converted to islam and married off the issue of the girls is long forgotten because i have long ago married them off he says laughing raising hopes among the families of the kidnapped girls who were taken from the northeastern nigerian town of chibok in april that their daughters would soon be released hopes began to fade said hamidah amira 36 whose daughter was kidnapped but then desperation set in especially as boko haram abducted dozens of young women and teenagers in northeast nigeria and continued to launch attacks that forced hundreds to flee the government insisted negotiations with the islamists were ongoing in chad as some began to raise doubts a was even agreed upon by the group senior researcher at the institute for security studies office in pretoria said he did think boko haram had agreed to a truce citing the lack of public statements on the issue in the past two weeks he said whose name loosely translates as western education is forbidden has abducted around 500 young women over the past five years the whereabouts and the fate of the rest of the young women are uncertain based on interviews with victims and witnesses of boko haram abductions offers rare insight into a series of physical and sexual abuses the girls suffer in captivity including rape forced labor and beating never really found out or learned what they gone through never attempted to do any kind of investigations said rona peligal human rights watch deputy director for the africa division they were kind of left on their own he said adding officials have failed to keep the community informed the international community has urged the nigerian government to step up its efforts to free the girls since april a campaign under the motto bring back our girls went viral on social media she said and the government should respond capably he said president goodluck jonathan who is under increasing scrutiny for his failure to locate the girls confirmed he would be running for and i expect it would be further politicized as we get closer to the election said peligal amira like other moms waits while making a personal appeal to boko haram to release her daughter and the other girls not with the government amira said

fear not the street artist is still roaming free spray can in hand despite a report stating the contrary the street publicist jo brooks told the independent the prank seems to have duped the internet with his name quickly trending on twitter published on us website national report alleged that the identity of the british street artist had finally been revealed and he had been arrested by metropolitan police and is being held bail on charges of vandalism conspiracy racketeering and where of dollars of counterfeit money along with future projects of were found along with id thought to belong to the famed anonymous street artist which allegedly identified him as paul homer a quick google search shows that the quotes were originally published in 2013 on hoax website on prlog the joke struck a nerve with louise mensch who fell wholeheartedly for the and chastised the police for arresting the street artist and not focusing on other more pressing issues metpoliceuk banksy there are so many criminals out there banksy the great artist in fact a prank she quickly apologised to the police banksy is still roaming free spray can in hand

the united states appears to now be flying unarmed surveillance drones over the is stronghold of raqqa syria the pictures thus far suggest that the drone being used is the predator the two photos show the distinct downward facing tail used on predator drones and the aircraft does not appear to be carrying any missiles as such the available evidence indicates that the drone is being used for surveillance purposes rather than in a type mission the drone has been circling over the city for three hours if the reports are true this would suggest that the air environment over raqqa is permissive drones are visible on radar and easy to shoot down with air defense systems the evidence thus far suggests that the drone is acquiring imagery and possibly signals intelligence sigint of islamic state positions in the most important stronghold there is little doubt that this mission is intended to give us policymakers more information about is positions in raqqa however it does not necessarily signal the imminent use of force against is positions in syria there is no information about where the drones are based however information allows for some informed guesses the united states currently bases predator drones in turkey at incirlik air force base the three drones are routinely flown over northern iraq and data is shared in real time with the turkish military

a tour of the royal grounds at buckingham palace went through the looking glass when were found in the garden the telegraph reports which will air on christmas day while taping the show gardening expert alan titchmarsh and ecology expert professor mick crawley noticed some red and white spotted fungi titchmarsh asked it edible and according to the telegraph professor crawley replied depends what you commonly known as fly agaric or fly mushroom does have hallucinogenic properties but it is not the same as the illicit psychoactive mushroom that contains the illegal drug psilocybin still titchmarsch wisely replied be eating any of titchmarsh told the sun that he was surprised to happen upon the red and toadstool was a surprise but it shows just how varied the species including a number of the amanita muscaria it is understood that the mushrooms grew naturally in the palace grounds rather than having been planted there palace officials made it clear to the ap that mushrooms from the garden are not used in the palace kitchens

sorry to disappoint fans of led zeppelin but it look like a reunion will be happening any time soon the famed lead singer robert plant literally tore up a contract to reunite the band worth almost 800 million saying the timing just right for a reunion tour offering the band an obscene amount of money just to reunite for a few dozen shows the contract was reportedly for 35 shows in three cities london berlin and an unnamed location in new jersey each of the three remaining original members would have earned somewhere over 200 million each just for performing while another 100 million in merchandising profits was to be shared between the group members and jason bonham the son of late drummer john bonham was set to step in for his father plant apparently met with conert promoters to discuss the deal and during the meeting actually ripped the contract in two ending any chance of a regrouping not like robert plant or any of the other members for that matter really need it led zeppelin are one of the most successful groups of all time having sold around 112 million records in the united states alone that figure is three or four times that when the entire planet is counted in fact they are the fourth music act in american history right behind the beatles elvis presley and garth brooks selling additional millions and making his chart history that much more impressive his collaborative album raising sand with singer alison krauss may not have been his most commercially successful but it was adored universally by critics and won he alison and producer burnett five grammys back in 2009 including record of the year and album of the year coda was released back in 1982 the band has continued to sell well throughout the years making millions in repackagings reissues and live album releases the last show together was in london back in december of 2007 which was a tribute to legendary music executive ahmet ertegün the concert is thought to have had the tickets of any show in history as when it was announced 20 million requests were submitted online for passes

if latest findings are true than biggest product of the year could be the macbook air you know right behind the apple watch according to early reports apple has completely redesigned the macbook air ditching the usb port magsafe connector and sd card slots for something entirely different yet also slightly narrower than the model the new version is approximately a narrower than the version yet it is also a taller in order to accommodate the slightly larger display in order to fit the larger screen into a footprint about the size of the current model the bezels on the display have been reduced on all too so a just seem unnecessary to keep up the macbook reputation of being and it makes sense to keep the screen size at or less however something smaller than will just be too small so the could actually fill that sweet spot nicely if design estimates are correct this is the start of a new design shift for the macbook air see features that are slimmer and more compact than before with an keyboard a modified trackpad and a thinner profile yes the air will actually be getting smaller which means it would no longer need a magsafe port as reports on usb indicate that it can be used to power computers 9to5mac believes this single port could be used as a sort of hub allowing users to plug in multiple devices to the air this is just speculation at this has yet to announce a new macbook air artist renditions are pretty cool check out their full report for more details

a guantanamo bay prisoner released last year as part of an exchange for captured us serviceman bowe bergdahl has resumed contact with the taliban according to reports who mostly held to positions within the taliban before their capture during the early days of the war in afghanistan were detained because of their association with the terror group which promised to monitor the men on behalf of the us who recently visited qatar said he had been afraid that one of the detainees had left the country but said he was assured during his visit that all five remain in the small gulf nation although they would then be free to leave mr graham told the associated press on wednesday just as sure as we sitting here they going back to the fight mr graham a member of the senate armed services committee and a leading capitol hill voice on foreign policy said all five are still in qatar but they told me they all still there he said we take any incidence of very seriously and we work in close coordination through military intelligence law enforcement and diplomatic channels to mitigate and to take action when necessary the statement said the defense department has a close security partnership with the government of qatar we confident in our ability to continue to mitigate any threat that may be posed by the former guantanamo detainees which the state department designated as a foreign terrorist organisation in 2012 claims allegiance to the afghan taliban yet operates with some degree of autonomy
